4. Bên bảo đảm có nghĩa vụ thực hiện các thủ tục chuyển quyền sở hữu tài sản cho bên nhận bảo đảm theo quy định của pháp luật.

Valuation of security assets

1. The security and guarantee party has the right to negotiate the security property price or valuation through the property valuation organization when handling the security property.

In case there is no agreement, the property is valued through asset valuation organization.

2. The valuation of security assets must be objective, in accordance with the market price.

3. The organization of valuation must pay damages if there is illegal act that causes damage to the guarantee, the guarantee party in the process of valuation of collaterals.

Thanh toán số tiền có được từ việc xử lý tài sản cầm cố, thế chấp

1. Số tiền có được từ việc xử lý tài sản cầm cố, thế chấp sau khi thanh toán chi phí bảo quản, thu giữ và xử lý tài sản cầm cố, thế chấp được thanh toán theo thứ tự ưu tiên quy định tại Điều 308 của Bộ luật này.

2. Trường hợp số tiền có được từ việc xử lý tài sản cầm cố, thế chấp sau khi thanh toán chi phí bảo quản, thu giữ và xử lý tài sản cầm cố, thế chấp lớn hơn giá trị nghĩa vụ được bảo đảm thì số tiền chênh lệch phải được trả cho bên bảo đảm.

3. Trường hợp số tiền có được từ việc xử lý tài sản cầm cố, thế chấp sau khi thanh toán chi phí bảo quản, thu giữ và xử lý tài sản cầm cố, thế chấp nhỏ hơn giá trị nghĩa vụ được bảo đảm thì phần nghĩa vụ chưa được thanh toán được xác định là nghĩa vụ không có bảo đảm, trừ trường hợp các bên có thỏa thuận bổ sung tài sản bảo đảm. Bên nhận bảo đảm có quyền yêu cầu bên có nghĩa vụ được bảo đảm phải thực hiện phần nghĩa vụ chưa được thanh toán.

Pledge property

The pledge of property is the one party (hereinafter referred to as the pledgee) assigns the property of its ownership to the other party (hereinafter referred to as the pledgee recipient) to ensure the performance of obligations.

Hiệu lực của cầm cố tài sản

1. Hợp đồng cầm cố tài sản có hiệu lực từ thời điểm giao kết, trừ trường hợp có thỏa thuận khác hoặc luật có quy định khác.

2. Cầm cố tài sản có hiệu lực đối kháng với người thứ ba kể từ thời điểm bên nhận cầm cố nắm giữ tài sản cầm cố.

Trường hợp bất động sản là đối tượng của cầm cố theo quy định của luật thì việc cầm cố bất động sản có hiệu lực đối kháng với người thứ ba kể từ thời điểm đăng ký.

Obligations of the pledge party

1. Assigning pledged properties to the pledgee as agreed upon.

2. To notify the pledgee of the third person's rights to the pledged property, if any;In case of not notifying, the pledgee may cancel the property contract and claim damages or maintain the contract and accept the third person's rights to the pledged property.

3. Payment to the pledgee for a reasonable cost to preserve the pledged property, unless otherwise agreed.

The rights of the pledge

1. Ask the pledgee to terminate the use of pledged properties in the case specified in Clause 3, Article 314 of this Code if used by the pledges that are at risk of losing value or decline.value.

2. Request the pledgee to return the pledged property and related papers, if there is sometimes the obligations are guaranteed by the pledge ending.

3. Requesting the mortgage party to compensate for damage to the pledged property.

4. Being sold, replaced, exchanged, donated to the pledged property if the pledgee agreed or in accordance with the Law.

Obligations of the pledgee recipient

1. Preserving and preserving the pledged property;If lost, lost or damaged the pledged property, the damage must be compensated for the pledgee.

2. Do not sell, exchange, donate or use pledged properties to ensure other obligations.

3. Do not lease, lend, exploit uses, enjoy benefits, income from pledged properties, except for other agreements.

4. Returning the pledged property and related papers, if any obligations are guaranteed by pledge termination or replaced by other security measures.

Quyền của bên nhận cầm cố

1. Yêu cầu người đang chiếm hữu, sử dụng trái pháp luật tài sản cầm cố trả lại tài sản đó.

2. Xử lý tài sản cầm cố theo phương thức đã thỏa thuận hoặc theo quy định của pháp luật.

3. Được cho thuê, cho mượn, khai thác công dụng tài sản cầm cố và hưởng hoa lợi, lợi tức từ tài sản cầm cố, nếu có thỏa thuận.

4. Được thanh toán chi phí hợp lý bảo quản tài sản cầm cố khi trả lại tài sản cho bên cầm cố.

Termination of property pledge

The pledge of property terminates in the following case:

1. Obligations are guaranteed by ceasing pledge.

2. The pledge of property is canceled or replaced by other security measures.

3. The pledged property has been processed.

4. According to the agreement of the parties.

Return the pledged property

When the pledge of property is terminated in accordance with Clauses 1 and 2, Article 315 of this Code or as agreed by the parties, the pledged property, papers related to the pledged property are returned to the partypledge.Flower benefits, income obtained from pledged properties are also returned to the pledgee, unless otherwise agreed.

Mortgage property

1. Property mortgage is the one party (hereinafter referred to as the mortgagor) using its own property to ensure the performance of obligations and not handing over the property to the other party (hereinafter referred to as the recipient.challenge).

2. The collateral is held by the mortgagee.The parties may agree to assign the third person to keep the collateral.

Collateral

1. In case of mortgage of all real estate and property with auxiliary objects, the auxiliary object of the real estate or the property also belongs to the collateral, unless otherwise agreed.

2. In case of a partial mortgage of real estate or auxiliary property, the auxiliary object is associated with that property of collateral, unless otherwise agreed.

3. In case of mortgage of land use rights where the property is attached to the land under the mortgaged party, the property attached to the land is also under the mortgaged property, unless otherwise agreed.

4. In case the mortgaged property is insured, the mortgagee must notify the insurance organization about the insurance asset being used for collateral.The insurance organization pays the insurance directly to the mortgagor when the insurance event occurs.

In case the mortgagor does not notify the insurance organization about the insurance assets being used for mortgage, the insurance organization pays the insurance premium under the insurance contract and the mortgagee is obliged to the bar.Mathematics for the mortgagee.

Effect of property mortgage

1. Property mortgage contracts are valid from the time of conclusion, except for other agreements or other laws.

2. Mortgage property generated effectively against the third person from the time of registration.

Nghĩa vụ của bên thế chấp

1. Giao giấy tờ liên quan đến tài sản thế chấp trong trường hợp các bên có thỏa thuận, trừ trường hợp luật có quy định khác.

2. Bảo quản, giữ gìn tài sản thế chấp.

3. Áp dụng các biện pháp cần thiết để khắc phục, kể cả phải ngừng việc khai thác công dụng tài sản thế chấp nếu do việc khai thác đó mà tài sản thế chấp có nguy cơ mất giá trị hoặc giảm sút giá trị.

4. Khi tài sản thế chấp bị hư hỏng thì trong một thời gian hợp lý bên thế chấp phải sửa chữa hoặc thay thế bằng tài sản khác có giá trị tương đương, trừ trường hợp có thỏa thuận khác.

5. Cung cấp thông tin về thực trạng tài sản thế chấp cho bên nhận thế chấp.

6. Giao tài sản thế chấp cho bên nhận thế chấp để xử lý khi thuộc một trong các trường hợp xử lý tài sản bảo đảm quy định tại Điều 299 của Bộ luật này.

7. Thông báo cho bên nhận thế chấp về các quyền của người thứ ba đối với tài sản thế chấp, nếu có; trường hợp không thông báo thì bên nhận thế chấp có quyền hủy hợp đồng thế chấp tài sản và yêu cầu bồi thường thiệt hại hoặc duy trì hợp đồng và chấp nhận quyền của người thứ ba đối với tài sản thế chấp.

8. Không được bán, thay thế, trao đổi, tặng cho tài sản thế chấp, trừ trường hợp quy định tại khoản 4 và khoản 5 Điều 321 của Bộ luật này.

The right of the mortgage party

1. Exploiting the uses, enjoying the benefits and profits from the mortgaged property, except for the case of gums and profits is also the collateral as agreed.

2. Investment to increase the value of collateral.

3. Receive mortgage assets held by the third person and papers related to the mortgage asset held by the mortgagor when the obligations are guaranteed by the mortgage termination or replaced by other security measures..

4. Sell, replace and exchange collateral, if that property is a circulating goods in the production and business process.In this case, the right to request the buyer to pay the money, the proceeds, the property formed from the amount collected, the property is replaced or exchanged to become collateral.

In case the mortgaged assets are warehouses, the mortgagee may replace goods in the warehouse, but must ensure the value of the goods in the warehouse as agreed.

5. To sell, exchange and donate to mortgaged assets that are not goods circulating in the production and business process, if the mortgagor agrees or in accordance with the Law.

6. To lease, lend collateral, but must notify the lessee, borrow the leasing property and lend are being used for mortgage and must notify the mortgagor.

Obligations of the mortgagee

1. Return papers to the mortgagee after termination of mortgage for the case of the parties agreement on the mortgage party to hold papers related to the mortgage property.

2. To carry out procedures for handling collateral in accordance with the law.

The right of the mortgagee

1. Reviewing and checking the collateral directly, but not obstructing or causing difficulties for the formation, use and exploitation of collateral.

2. Requesting the mortgagee must provide information about the status of collateral.

3. Requesting the mortgagee to apply the necessary measures to preserve assets and property value in the event of a risk of losing value or reducing the value of assets due to the exploitation and use.

4. Carry out the mortgage registration in accordance with the law.

5. Request the mortgagee or the third person to keep the mortgage property for themselves to handle when the mortgagor does not perform or perform improper obligations.

6. Keep papers related to collateral in case the parties have agreed, unless otherwise prescribed.

7. Handling mortgaged assets when under the case specified in Article 299 of this Code.

Mortgage land use rights without mortgage assets attached to land

1. In case of mortgage of land use rights without mortgage assets attached to land and land users and the owner of property attached to the land, the property is processed including assets attached toFor land, except for other agreements.

2. In case of mortgage of land use rights that land users are not at the same time the owner of the property attached to the land, when handling the land use right, the owner of the property is attached to the land.land use within the scope of their rights and obligations;The rights and obligations of the mortgagee in the relationship with the property owner attached to the land are transferred to the recipient of land use rights, unless otherwise agreed.

Mortgage assets attached to land without mortgage of land use rights

1. In case of mortgage assets attached to land without mortgage of land use rights and property owners attached to land and land user, the property is processed including the use rights.Land, except for other agreements.

2. In case of mortgage of property attached to the land without mortgage of land use rights and the owner of the property attached to the land is not and the land user, when handling the property attached to the land and the land and the land and the land and the land at the same time.The recipient transferred the property ownership of land attached to the land to continue using the land within the scope of the rights and obligations of the property owner attached to the transferred land, unless otherwise agreed.

Chấm dứt thế chấp tài sản

Thế chấp tài sản chấm dứt trong trường hợp sau đây:

1. Nghĩa vụ được bảo đảm bằng thế chấp chấm dứt.

2. Việc thế chấp tài sản được hủy bỏ hoặc được thay thế bằng biện pháp bảo đảm khác.

3. Tài sản thế chấp đã được xử lý.

4. Theo thỏa thuận của các bên.

Đặt cọc

1. Đặt cọc là việc một bên (sau đây gọi là bên đặt cọc) giao cho bên kia (sau đây gọi là bên nhận đặt cọc) một khoản tiền hoặc kim khí quý, đá quý hoặc vật có giá trị khác (sau đây gọi chung là tài sản đặt cọc) trong một thời hạn để bảo đảm giao kết hoặc thực hiện hợp đồng.

2. Trường hợp hợp đồng được giao kết, thực hiện thì tài sản đặt cọc được trả lại cho bên đặt cọc hoặc được trừ để thực hiện nghĩa vụ trả tiền; nếu bên đặt cọc từ chối việc giao kết, thực hiện hợp đồng thì tài sản đặt cọc thuộc về bên nhận đặt cọc; nếu bên nhận đặt cọc từ chối việc giao kết, thực hiện hợp đồng thì phải trả cho bên đặt cọc tài sản đặt cọc và một khoản tiền tương đương giá trị tài sản đặt cọc, trừ trường hợp có thỏa thuận khác.

Grip

1. The deposit is that the lessee is the property assigned to the lessee for a money or precious metal, gemstones or other valuable objects (hereinafter collectively referred to as a deposit property) for a deadline forensure the return of rental property.

2. In case the leased property is returned, the lessee may return the deposit after paying the rent;If the lessee does not return the leased property, the lessor has the right to reclaim the leased property;If the rental property is no longer available, the deposit property belongs to the tenant.

Ký quỹ

1. Ký quỹ là việc bên có nghĩa vụ gửi một khoản tiền hoặc kim khí quý, đá quý hoặc giấy tờ có giá vào tài khoản phong tỏa tại một tổ chức tín dụng để bảo đảm việc thực hiện nghĩa vụ.

2. Trường hợp bên có nghĩa vụ không thực hiện hoặc thực hiện không đúng nghĩa vụ thì bên có quyền được tổ chức tín dụng nơi ký quỹ thanh toán, bồi thường thiệt hại do bên có nghĩa vụ gây ra, sau khi trừ chi phí dịch vụ.

3. Thủ tục gửi và thanh toán thực hiện theo quy định của pháp luật.

Reserve ownership

1. In the purchase contract, property ownership may be reserved by the seller until the payment obligation is fully implemented.

2. Reserve ownership must be made in a separate document or stated in the sale contract.

3. Reserve the ownership of the validity generated against the third person from the time of registration.

Trường hợp bên mua không hoàn thành nghĩa vụ thanh toán cho bên bán theo thỏa thuận thì bên bán có quyền đòi lại tài sản. Trường hợp bên mua làm mất, hư hỏng tài sản thì bên bán có quyền yêu cầu bồi thường thiệt hại.

Rights and obligations of the asset buyer

1. Using properties and benefits and profits from assets within the time limit for reservation of ownership of ownership.

2. Tearing property risks within the time limit for reservation of ownership, unless otherwise agreed.

Chấm dứt bảo lưu quyền sở hữu

Bảo lưu quyền sở hữu chấm dứt trong trường hợp sau đây:

1. Nghĩa vụ thanh toán cho bên bán được thực hiện xong.

2. Bên bán nhận lại tài sản bảo lưu quyền sở hữu.

Guarantee

1. Guarantee is the third person (hereinafter referred to as the guarantor) committed to the right party (hereinafter referred to as the guarantor) will fulfill the obligations instead of the obligor (hereinafter referred to asThe guaranteed party), if the time limit for fulfilling the obligations that the guarantee does not perform or perform improper obligations.

2. The parties may agree on the guarantee that the obligor must only fulfill their obligations on behalf of the guarantee in case the guarantee is unable to fulfill the guarantee obligations.

Guarantee scope

1. The guarantor may commit to the guarantee of part or the entire obligations for the guaranteed party.

2. Guarantee obligations include interest on principal, fines, compensation for damage, interest on late payment, unless otherwise agreed.

3. The parties may agree to use security measures by property to ensure the performance of guarantee obligations.

Remuneration

The guarantor is entitled to remuneration if the guarantor and the guarantee are agreed upon.

Nhiều người cùng bảo lãnh

Khi nhiều người cùng bảo lãnh một nghĩa vụ thì phải liên đới thực hiện việc bảo lãnh, trừ trường hợp có thỏa thuận hoặc pháp luật có quy định bảo lãnh theo các phần độc lập; bên có quyền có thể yêu cầu bất cứ ai trong số những người bảo lãnh liên đới phải thực hiện toàn bộ nghĩa vụ.

Khi một người trong số những người bảo lãnh liên đới đã thực hiện toàn bộ nghĩa vụ thay cho bên được bảo lãnh thì có quyền yêu cầu những người bảo lãnh còn lại phải thực hiện phần nghĩa vụ của họ đối với mình.

The relationship between the guarantor and the guarantor

1. In case the guarantee does not perform or performing their obligations incorrectly, the guarantor may request the guarantor to perform the guarantee obligations, unless the parties have an agreement on the guarantor.Lanh only must fulfill their obligations on behalf of the guaranteed party in case the guarantee is unable to fulfill their obligations.

2. The guarantor is not required to the guarantor to perform the obligations instead of the guarantee when the obligation is not due.

3. The guarantor must not fulfill the guarantee obligations in case the guarantor may compensate for the obligations to the guarantee.

Request rights of the guarantor

The guarantor has the right to request the guarantee to fulfill its obligations to the scope of the guarantee obligation, unless otherwise agreed.

Exemption from the performance of guarantee obligations

1. In case the guarantor must perform the guarantee obligations that the guarantor exempted the obligations to the guarantor, the guarantor must not perform the obligations to the guarantee, except for the case.There are other agreements or laws.

Civil liability of the guarantor

2. In case the guarantor does not fulfill the guarantee obligations, the guarantor may request the guarantor to pay the value of the violation obligations and compensate for damage.

Chấm dứt bảo lãnh

Bảo lãnh chấm dứt trong trường hợp sau đây:

1. Nghĩa vụ được bảo lãnh chấm dứt.

2. Việc bảo lãnh được hủy bỏ hoặc được thay thế bằng biện pháp bảo đảm khác.

3. Bên bảo lãnh đã thực hiện nghĩa vụ bảo lãnh.

4. Theo thỏa thuận của các bên.

Guarantee by the unsecured social organization

The socio -political organization at the grassroots level may be guaranteed by unsecured people and poor households who borrow money at credit institutions for production, business and consumption as prescribed by law.

Cầm giữ tài sản

Cầm giữ tài sản là việc bên có quyền (sau đây gọi là bên cầm giữ) đang nắm giữ hợp pháp tài sản là đối tượng của hợp đồng song vụ được chiếm giữ tài sản trong trường hợp bên có nghĩa vụ không thực hiện hoặc thực hiện không đúng nghĩa vụ.

Xác lập cầm giữ tài sản

1. Cầm giữ tài sản phát sinh từ thời điểm đến hạn thực hiện nghĩa vụ mà bên có nghĩa vụ không thực hiện hoặc thực hiện không đúng nghĩa vụ.

2. Cầm giữ tài sản phát sinh hiệu lực đối kháng với người thứ ba kể từ thời điểm bên cầm giữ chiếm giữ tài sản.

The right of the holder

1. Requesting the obligor to fulfill the obligations arising from the bilateral contract.

2. Requesting the obligor to pay the cost necessary for the preservation and preservation of assets held.

3. Being exploited assets held to collect benefits and profits if the party is obliged to agree.

The value of the exploitation of held assets is clearly compensated on the obligor's duty.

The obligations of the holder

1. Keeping and preserving assets held.

Termination of hold

5. According to the parties agreement.

Trách nhiệm dân sự do vi phạm nghĩa vụ

1. Bên có nghĩa vụ mà vi phạm nghĩa vụ thì phải chịu trách nhiệm dân sự đối với bên có quyền.

Vi phạm nghĩa vụ là việc bên có nghĩa vụ không thực hiện nghĩa vụ đúng thời hạn, thực hiện không đầy đủ nghĩa vụ hoặc thực hiện không đúng nội dung của nghĩa vụ.

2. Trường hợp bên có nghĩa vụ không thực hiện đúng nghĩa vụ do sự kiện bất khả kháng thì không phải chịu trách nhiệm dân sự, trừ trường hợp có thỏa thuận khác hoặc pháp luật có quy định khác.

3. Bên có nghĩa vụ không phải chịu trách nhiệm dân sự nếu chứng minh được nghĩa vụ không thực hiện được là hoàn toàn do lỗi của bên có quyền.

Trách nhiệm tiếp tục thực hiện nghĩa vụ

Khi bên có nghĩa vụ thực hiện không đúng nghĩa vụ của mình thì bên có quyền được yêu cầu bên có nghĩa vụ tiếp tục thực hiện nghĩa vụ.

Slowly fulfill the obligations

1. Slow fulfillment of obligations is the obligation that has not been performed or only partially performed when the term of fulfillment of obligations has expired.

2. Slowly performing obligations must immediately notify the party with the right to not fulfill the obligations on time.

Postponed fulfillment of obligations

1. When the obligations cannot be fulfilled on time, the obligor must immediately notify the party with the right to know and propose to postpone the performance of obligations.

In case of not notifying the authority, the obligor must pay compensation for damage arising, unless otherwise agreed or due to objective causes cannot be notified.

2. The obligor has a postponement of the performance of obligations, if the party has the right to agree.The performance of obligations when postponed is still considered to be done on time.

Slowly accept the performance of obligations

1. Slowly receive the performance of obligations is that when the time limit for fulfilling the obligations that the obligor has performed but the right does not receive the performance of that obligation.

2. In case of slow receipt of the object of the obligation, the obligor may send the property at the place of receiving the property or the application of other necessary measures to preserve the property and have the right to requestReasonable cost payment.In case the property is kept, the obligor must immediately notify the authority.

3. For properties at risk of being damaged, the obligor has the right to sell such property and must immediately notify the authority, pay to the party with the right to be collected from the sale of the property after subtractingReasonable cost to preserve and sell such assets.

Trách nhiệm do không thực hiện nghĩa vụ giao vật

1. Trường hợp nghĩa vụ giao vật đặc định không được thực hiện thì bên bị vi phạm có quyền yêu cầu bên vi phạm phải giao đúng vật đó; nếu vật không còn hoặc bị hư hỏng thì phải thanh toán giá trị của vật.

2. Trường hợp nghĩa vụ giao vật cùng loại không được thực hiện thì bên bị vi phạm có quyền yêu cầu bên vi phạm phải giao vật cùng loại khác; nếu không có vật cùng loại khác thay thế thì phải thanh toán giá trị của vật.

3. Trường hợp việc vi phạm nghĩa vụ quy định tại khoản 1 và khoản 2 Điều này mà gây thiệt hại cho bên bị vi phạm thì bên vi phạm phải bồi thường thiệt hại.

Trách nhiệm do chậm thực hiện nghĩa vụ trả tiền

1. Trường hợp bên có nghĩa vụ chậm trả tiền thì bên đó phải trả lãi đối với số tiền chậm trả tương ứng với thời gian chậm trả.

2. Lãi suất phát sinh do chậm trả tiền được xác định theo thỏa thuận của các bên nhưng không được vượt quá mức lãi suất được quy định tại khoản 1 Điều 468 của Bộ luật này; nếu không có thỏa thuận thì thực hiện theo quy định tại khoản 2 Điều 468 của Bộ luật này.

Responsibility for not performing or not performing a job

1. If the obligor does not perform a job that you have to do, the right may request the obligor to continue or perform or assign other people to do that job andRequesting the obligation to pay reasonable expenses and compensation for damage.

2. When the obligor is not allowed to perform a job but performing that job, the right to request the obligor must end the implementation, restore the original situation and compensate fordamage.

Responsibility due to slow receipt of obligations

The party has the right to accept the performance of obligations that cause damage to the obligor, they must pay damages to that party and must bear all risks and expenses incurred from the time of slow receiving, exceptIn case the law has other regulations.

Responsibility for compensation for damage due to violations of obligations

In case of damage caused by violations of obligations, the obligor must pay all the damage, unless otherwise agreed or the law has other regulations.

Damage due to violations of obligations

1. Damage due to violations of obligations include material damage and mental damage.

2. Material damage is a determined actual physical loss, including property losses, reasonable costs to prevent, limit, overcome damage, actual income lost or suffer from beingreduced.

3. Mental damage is mental loss due to being invaded to life, health, honor, dignity, prestige and other identity benefits of a subject.

Obligation to prevent and limit damage

The party has the right to apply the necessary and reasonable measures so that the damage does not occur or limits the damage to themselves.

Compensation for damage in case the party is violated at fault

In case of violation of obligations and damage due to part of the violation of the violating party, the violation must only compensate for damage corresponding to the degree of fault.

Lỗi trong trách nhiệm dân sự

Lỗi trong trách nhiệm dân sự bao gồm lỗi cố ý, lỗi vô ý.

Lỗi cố ý là trường hợp một người nhận thức rõ hành vi của mình sẽ gây thiệt hại cho người khác mà vẫn thực hiện và mong muốn hoặc tuy không mong muốn nhưng để mặc cho thiệt hại xảy ra.

Lỗi vô ý là trường hợp một người không thấy trước hành vi của mình có khả năng gây thiệt hại, mặc dù phải biết hoặc có thể biết trước thiệt hại sẽ xảy ra hoặc thấy trước hành vi của mình có khả năng gây thiệt hại, nhưng cho rằng thiệt hại sẽ không xảy ra hoặc có thể ngăn chặn được.

Transfer the request

1. The party has the right to request the fulfillment of obligations that may transfer that right to the authority as agreed upon, except for the following case:

a) Right to request support and claim damages due to infringement to life, health, honor, dignity and prestige;

b) The party has the right and the obligor to have an agreement or the law that provides for not being transferred to the required rights.

2. When the party has the right to request the transfer of the right to request the powerful person, the powerful person becomes the party with the right to request.The transfer of the right to request no need for the obligor's consent.

The transferor of the right to request a written notice to the party is obliged to know about the transfer of the request, unless otherwise agreed.In case the transferor requires not notifying the transfer of the rights but the expenses for the obligor, the transferred party requires the payment of this expense.

Obligations to provide information and transfer papers

1. Persons transfer the right to request the necessary information, transfer the relevant papers to the powerful person.

2. Persons who transfer the right to request violations of obligations specified in Clause 1 of this Article that cause damage must pay damages.

Không chịu trách nhiệm sau khi chuyển giao quyền yêu cầu

Người chuyển giao quyền yêu cầu không phải chịu trách nhiệm về khả năng thực hiện nghĩa vụ của bên có nghĩa vụ sau khi chuyển giao quyền yêu cầu, trừ trường hợp có thỏa thuận khác.

Transfer the right to request measures to ensure the performance of obligations

In case the right to request the obligation to take secure measures, the transfer of the required rights includes that security measure.

Quyền từ chối của bên có nghĩa vụ

1. Trường hợp bên có nghĩa vụ không được thông báo về việc chuyển giao quyền yêu cầu và người thế quyền không chứng minh về tính xác thực của việc chuyển giao quyền yêu cầu thì bên có nghĩa vụ có quyền từ chối việc thực hiện nghĩa vụ đối với người thế quyền.

2. Trường hợp bên có nghĩa vụ do không được thông báo về việc chuyển giao quyền yêu cầu mà đã thực hiện nghĩa vụ đối với người chuyển giao quyền yêu cầu thì người thế quyền không được yêu cầu bên có nghĩa vụ phải thực hiện nghĩa vụ đối với mình.

Transfer of obligations

1. The obligor can transfer obligations to the person who is obliged if the party has the right to agree, except for the case of the obligation associated with the identity of the obligor or the law whether it is not transferred.duty.

2. When being transferred to the obligation, the person who is obliged to become a duty.

Transfer of obligations to take guaranteed measures

In case the obligation to take measures is transferred, that security measure is terminated, unless otherwise agreed.

Hoàn thành nghĩa vụ

Nghĩa vụ được hoàn thành khi bên có nghĩa vụ đã thực hiện toàn bộ nghĩa vụ hoặc thực hiện một phần nghĩa vụ nhưng phần còn lại được bên có quyền cho miễn thực hiện.

Hoàn thành nghĩa vụ trong trường hợp bên có quyền chậm tiếp nhận đối tượng của nghĩa vụ

Khi bên có quyền chậm tiếp nhận đối tượng của nghĩa vụ là tài sản thì nghĩa vụ hoàn thành tại thời điểm tài sản đã được gửi giữ tại nơi nhận gửi giữ theo quy định tại khoản 2 Điều 355 của Bộ luật này.

Chấm dứt nghĩa vụ theo thỏa thuận

Các bên có thể thỏa thuận chấm dứt nghĩa vụ bất cứ lúc nào, nhưng không được gây thiệt hại đến lợi ích quốc gia, dân tộc, lợi ích công cộng, quyền và lợi ích hợp pháp của người khác.

Chấm dứt nghĩa vụ do được miễn thực hiện nghĩa vụ

1. Nghĩa vụ chấm dứt khi bên có quyền miễn việc thực hiện nghĩa vụ cho bên có nghĩa vụ, trừ trường hợp pháp luật có quy định khác.

2. Khi nghĩa vụ có biện pháp bảo đảm được miễn thì biện pháp bảo đảm cũng chấm dứt.

Ending the obligations due to being replaced by other obligations

1. In case the parties agreed to replace their initial obligations with other obligations, the initial obligation terminated.

2. Obligations also terminate, if the right party has received property or other jobs to replace the property or work agreed in advance.

3. In case of obligations is the obligation to supply and compensate for damage due to infringement of life, health, honor, dignity, reputation and other obligations associated with the personal identity that cannot be transferred to others.It is not replaced by other obligations.

End obligations due to offset obligations

1. In case the parties have the obligations of the same type of property to each other, when they are due, they do not have to perform their obligations to each other and the obligations are considered terminated, unless otherwise prescribed by the law..

2. In case the value of the property or work is not equivalent to each other, the parties pay each other to the difference value.

3. Items that are valued at money can also be offset with the obligation to pay.

Ending the obligations due to the integration of the obligor and the right

When the obligor became the right to the right to that obligation, the obligation ended.

End of obligations due to the expiry of the exemption of obligations

When the statute of limitations for exempting the obligations has ended, the obligation ends.

Chấm dứt nghĩa vụ khi bên có quyền là cá nhân chết hoặc pháp nhân chấm dứt tồn tại

Khi các bên có thỏa thuận hoặc pháp luật có quy định về việc nghĩa vụ được thực hiện chỉ dành cho cá nhân hoặc pháp nhân là bên có quyền mà cá nhân chết hoặc pháp nhân chấm dứt tồn tại thì nghĩa vụ cũng chấm dứt.

End the obligations when the special object is gone

The obligation to assign objects ended in case the object must be delivered is no longer existing.

The parties may agree to replace other objects or compensate for damage.

End obligations in the case of bankruptcy

In case of bankruptcy, the obligation terminated in accordance with the Bankruptcy Law.

Khái niệm hợp đồng

Hợp đồng là sự thỏa thuận giữa các bên về việc xác lập, thay đổi hoặc chấm dứt quyền, nghĩa vụ dân sự.

Proposal to contract contracts

1. Proposal of contracting is to clearly show the intention of contracting and under the constraint of this proposal to the Party that has been identified or to the public (hereinafter collectively referred to as the partyrecommended).

2. In case of a contractual proposal, it will clearly state the time limit for answering, if the party proposes to interact with the third person in the waiting time limit for the requesting party to answer, the damage must be compensated for the party.Proposal without contracting if any damage arises.

Thông tin trong giao kết hợp đồng

1. Trường hợp một bên có thông tin ảnh hưởng đến việc chấp nhận giao kết hợp đồng của bên kia thì phải thông báo cho bên kia biết.

2. Trường hợp một bên nhận được thông tin bí mật của bên kia trong quá trình giao kết hợp đồng thì có trách nhiệm bảo mật thông tin và không được sử dụng thông tin đó cho mục đích riêng của mình hoặc cho mục đích trái pháp luật khác.

3. Bên vi phạm quy định tại khoản 1, khoản 2 Điều này mà gây thiệt hại thì phải bồi thường.

Change, withdraw the proposal of contracting

1. The party requesting the contract can change and withdraw the contract to transfer the contract in the following case:

a) The requesting party will receive a notice of change or withdraw the proposal in advance or with the same time as the proposal;

b) Conditions for changing or withdrawing the proposal arising in case the requesting party clearly stated that the change or withdrawal of the proposal when that condition arises.

2. When the party proposes to change the content of the proposal, it is a new proposal.

Cancellate the contract for contracting

The party requesting the contract may cancel the proposal if it has clearly stated this right in the proposal and the requesting party will receive a notice of the cancellation of the request before this person sends a notice of acceptance of the proposal.contract.

Amendments proposed by the proposed party

When the requesting party has accepted the contract but stated the conditions or amendments, it is considered that this person has made a new proposal.

Accept the proposal for contracting

1. Accepting the contractual proposal is the respondent of the proposed party on accepting the entire content of the request.

2. The silence of the suggested party is not considered to accept the proposal for contracting, unless the case has an agreement or a habit that has been established between the parties.

Time limit for accepting contracts

1. When the requesting party has a decision of the time limit for answering, the acceptance of acceptance is only valid when it is done within that time limit;If the requesting party for the contract will receive a response when the response is expired, this acceptance is considered a new proposal of the delayed answer.

When the requesting party did not specify the time limit for answering, the acceptance of acceptance was only valid if done within a reasonable time limit.

2. In case of notice of accepting contracts to slow and slow reasons for the objective reasons that the party proposes to know or must know about this objective reason, the notice of acceptance of contracts is still valid, except for the case.The requesting party immediately did not agree with that acceptance of the proposed party.

3. When the parties are directly communicating with each other, even in the case of telephone or other vehicles, the requesting party must immediately answer whether it is accepted or not accepted, unless the parties have an agreement.About the time limit for reply.

In case the party proposes to transfer a contract to die, lose civil act capacity or have difficulties in awareness and control of behavior

In case the party suggests to die, lose the capacity of civil acts or have difficulties in awareness, control the behavior after the party is asked to answer the contract to accept the contract, the proposal of the contract still has a price.Treatment, except for the case of conclusion associated with the proposed body.

In case the party is proposed to transmit a death contract, lose civil act capacity or have difficulties in awareness and control of behavior

In case the proposed party has accepted the contract but then died, lost civil act capacity or had difficulties in awareness and control of behavior, the response to accepting the contract still has a price.Treatment, except for the case of conclusion associated with the proposed body.

Withdraw notice of acceptance of contracts

The party proposed to interact with the contract may withdraw the notice of accepting the contract, if the notice of this withdrawal comes first or with the time the requesting party will receive a reply to accept the contract.

Contracting location

Contracting locations agreed upon by the parties;If there is no agreement, the conclusion location is the residence of individuals or headquarters of the legal entity, which has proposed a contract.

Time of contracting

1. The contract is concluded at the time when the party proposes to receive the conclusion.

2. In case the parties have a silent agreement that is a response to contracting within a period of time, the time of contracting is the last time of that time limit.

3. The time of conclusion of a speech contract is the time when the parties have agreed on the content of the contract.

4. The time of transmission of a written contract is the last time to sign the document or by other acceptance form shown in the text.

In case the contract concludes in words and is later in writing, the time of the contract to contract is determined according to Clause 3 of this Article.

Validity of contract

1. The contract is legally effective from the time of the conclusion, except for other agreements or other relevant laws.

2. From the time the contract takes effect, the parties must exercise the rights and obligations to each other as committed.The contract may only be amended or canceled according to the agreement of the parties or in accordance with the law.

The main types of contracts

The contract includes the following main types:

1. The contract is a contract that each party has an obligation to each other.

2. Single contract is a contract that only one party has an obligation.

3. The main contract is a contract that does not depend on the sub -contract.

4. Auxiliary contracts are contracts that depend on the main contract.

5. Contract for the benefit of a third person is the contract that the parties contract must fulfill their obligations and the third person benefits the benefits from the performance of that obligation.

6. Conditional contracts are contracts that depend on the generation, change or termination of a certain event.

Contract Appendix

1. The contract may have an attached appendix to detail some terms of the contract.Contract Appendix is ​​valid as contract.The content of the contract appendix is ​​not contrary to the content of the contract.

2. In case the Contract Appendix has the terms contrary to the contents of the terms of the contract, this provision is not valid, unless otherwise agreed.In case the parties accept the Appendix of the contract that is contrary to the terms of the contract, it is considered that the provision of the contract has been amended.

Contract explanation

1. When the contract has an unclear term, the explanation of that provision is not only based on the language of the contract but also on the will of the parties shown in the whole process first, at the time, at the time.Set up, contract performance.

2. When the contract has a term or language that can be understood in many different meanings, it must be explained in the most appropriate sense for the purpose and nature of the contract.

3. When the contract has a difficult term or language, it must be explained according to the custom at the contract.

4. The terms of the contract must be explained in the connection with each other, so that the meaning of those provisions is suitable for the entire content of the contract.

5. In case there is a conflict between the common will of the parties and the words used in the contract, the common will of the parties is used to explain the contract.

6. In case the drafting party includes the adverse content contract for the other party, when explaining the contract, it must be beneficial to the other party.

Contract according to the form

1. The form of a form is a contract of provisions given by one party for the other party to answer for a reasonable time;If the party is asked to answer, it is considered as accepting the entire contract content according to the form that the requesting party has given.

The model contract must be made public so that the party is asked to know or must know about the contents of the contract.

The order and formula for public contracts according to the form comply with the provisions of law.

2. In case the form of a form with an unclear term, the party giving a contract according to the form must be disadvantaged when explaining that terms.

3. In case the contract is formed by the provisions of the party's responsibility, the contract is made, increasing the responsibility or eliminating the legitimate rights of the other party, this provision is not valid, unless the case is satisfied.Different.

General transaction conditions in contract interaction

1. General transaction conditions are stable provisions published by one party to apply to the party proposed to transfer contracts;If the party is proposed to accept the contract, it is considered as accepting these terms.

2. General transaction conditions are only valid for the establishment of the transaction in case this transaction condition has been made public so that the party will know or must know about that condition.

The order and formula for public transaction conditions shall comply with the provisions of law.

3. General transaction conditions must ensure equality between the parties.In case the general transaction conditions have provisions on the responsibility of the party to provide general transaction conditions, increase responsibility or eliminate the legitimate rights of the other party, this regulation is not valid, unless there is any case ofOther agreements.

Contracts invalid

1. Regulations on invalid civil transactions from Article 123 to Article 133 of this Code are also applicable to invalid contracts.

2. The invalidation of the main contract to terminate the sub -contract, except for cases where the parties have a subcontract agreement, the main contract is replaced.This provision does not apply to measures to ensure the performance of obligations.

3. The invalidation of the sub -contract does not terminate the main contract, unless the parties agreed on the sub -contract agreement are an inseparable part of the main contract.

The contract is invalid because there are objects that cannot be done

1. In case of the signing, the contract with an object cannot be done, this contract is invalid.

2. In case of a contract that one party knows or must know about the contract that there are subjects that cannot be done but does not notify the other party so the other party has transferred the contract, it must compensate for damage.For the other side, except for the other party to know or must know about the contract that has an object that cannot be done.

3. The provisions of Clauses 1 and 2 of this Article also applies to the case that the contract has one or more parts of the object that cannot be implemented but the rest of the contract is still valid.

Implementation of application contracts

For the application contract, the obligor must fulfill the obligations as agreed, only performed before or after the deadline if the Party has the right to agree.

Make a bilateral contract

1. In the bilateral contract, when the parties have agreed to fulfill their obligations, each party must fulfill their obligations when they are due;Do not postpone implementation on the grounds that the other party has not fulfilled their obligations to them, except for the case specified in Article 411 and Article 413 of this Code.

2. In case the parties do not agree on any party to perform the obligations first, the parties must simultaneously fulfill their obligations to each other;If the obligation cannot be performed simultaneously, the obligation to perform more time takes time, the obligation must be done first.

The right to postpone fulfillment of obligations in a bilateral contract

1. The right of the right obligation has the right to postpone the performance of obligations, if the ability to perform the obligations of the other party has been reduced so seriously that it is impossible to fulfill the obligations as committed until the sideKia has the ability to perform obligations or take measures to ensure the performance of obligations.

2. The right of the following obligation has the right to postpone the execution of obligations if the obligor has not fulfilled its obligations before it is due.

Hold assets in a bilateral contract

In case the obligor fails to fulfill his obligations, the party has the right to establish the right to hold property for the property of the obligor as prescribed from Article 346 to Article 350 of this Code.

The obligation cannot be done due to the fault of one party

In the bilateral contract, when one party fails to fulfill their obligations due to the other party's fault, they have the right to request the other party to still fulfill their obligations to them or cancel the contract and request compensation for damage..

Unable to fulfill the obligations but not due to the faults of the parties

In the bilateral contract, if one party fails to fulfill its obligations and the parties are not at fault, the party does not perform the obligation without the right to request the other party to perform the obligations to them.In case one party has fulfilled a part of the obligation, the right to request the other party to fulfill the corresponding obligations for them.

Make a contract for the benefit of a third person

When performing the contract for the benefit of a third person, the third person has the right to directly request the obligor to fulfill his obligations to him;If the contracting parties have a dispute over the performance of the contract, the third person does not have the right to request the performance of obligations until the dispute is resolved.

The right party may also request the obligor to perform the contract for the benefit of a third person.

Third person's refusal right

1. In case the third person rejects his interests before the obligor is fulfilled, the obligor does not have to perform the obligations, but must notify the authority and the contract is considered to be suffering.Cancel, the parties must return to each other what they have received.

2. In case the third person rejects his interests after the obligor has fulfilled his obligations, the obligations are considered to be completed and the right party must still fulfill the commitment to the obligor.In this case, the benefits arising from the contract belongs to the party but if the contract is not for the benefit of the third person, they are beneficiaries, except for other agreements.

Do not modify or cancel the contract for the benefit of the third person

When the third person agreed to benefit, even though the contract has not been implemented, the parties in the contract are not modified or canceled the contract, unless the third person agrees.

Agreement for penalties for violations

1. The penalty of violations is an agreement between the parties in the contract, whereby the party violates the obligation to pay an amount to the violated party.

2. The penalty level is agreed upon by the parties, unless otherwise provided for by relevant laws.

3. The parties may agree on the violation of the obligations only subject to violations without having to compensate for damage or both have to be penalized and have to compensate for damage.

In case the parties have an agreement on penalties but failing to agree on both sanctions and compensation for damage, the violating party is only subject to penalties.

Damage is compensated for contract violations

In case the obligor cannot fulfill its part or entire obligations, the purpose of the party has the right to be unable to achieve, the right to cancel the contract and claim damages.

In case the cancellation of contracts is not grounded in Articles 423, 424, 425 and 426 of this Code, the party cancellation is determined as the party that violates the obligations and must perform the responsibility.Civil due to failing to fulfill the obligations in accordance with this Code, other laws are related.

In case the unilateral termination of contract performance is not grounded in Clause 1 of this Article, the unilateral termination of the contract is determined as a violation of obligations and must perform the people's responsibility.In accordance with this Code, other laws are relevant due to failure to fulfill their obligations in the contract.
