In the process of drafting an inspection conclusion, the inspection decision maker has the right to request the head of the inspection team and other members of the inspection team to report, request the inspection subjects or the agency or the group.Relevant functions and individuals explain and clarify the expected issues of conclusions on the inspection content.

3. The explanation must be made in writing with information, documents and evidence to prove the explanation content.The head of the inspection team is responsible for researching and proposing to the inspection decision to handle the explanation of the inspection subject.

4. The draft inspection conclusions are sent to other members of the inspection team to participate in the comments before submitting the inspection decision.

Other members of the inspection team have the right to reserve comments on the contents of the draft inspection conclusions.The head of the inspection team has the right to reserve the content of the content in the inspection conclusions before the inspection decision.The reservation is expressed in writing attached to the draft inspection conclusions.

5. Development time for drafting inspection conclusions is calculated from the date the person who issues the inspection decision to assign the draft inspection conclusions and are prescribed as follows:

a) For the inspection conducted by the Government Inspectorate, the time for drafting the drafting conclusions of the inspection shall not exceed 30 days, complicated cases may last but not more than 45 days;

b) For the inspection by the Ministry Inspectorate, the General Department of the General Department, the Department, the provincial Inspectorate, the time to draft the inspection conclusions shall not exceed 20 days, the complicated case may last butNot more than 30 days;

c) For the inspection conducted by the Department Inspectorate, the district inspection, the time for drafting the inspection conclusions shall not exceed 15 days, the complicated case may last but not exceeding 20 days.

Evaluation of the draft inspection conclusions

The draft inspection conclusions of the Government Inspectorate, the draft of the administrative inspection conclusions of the Ministry Inspectorate and the provincial Inspectorate must be appraised before signing the issuance.The evaluation of the draft specialized inspection conclusions of the Ministry Inspectorate and the provincial Inspectorate, the draft inspection conclusions of other inspection agencies are implemented when necessary.

2. The inspection decision makers consider and decide the assignment of units and individuals to conduct the appraisal of the draft inspection conclusions (hereinafter collectively referred to as the person who conducts the evaluation) to ensure the purpose,Requirements and contents under the inspection decision and the approved inspection plan.The appraisal of the draft inspection conclusions must be written in writing, which clearly states the content and time limit for appraisal.

3. The appraisal person has the right to request the inspection team to provide necessary information and documents for appraisal;Develop a report on evaluation results and take responsibility to the inspection decision on the evaluation results.

4. The inspection decision makers shall direct the review, absorbing the appraisal and completing the draft inspection conclusions.

Request the subjects to provide information, documents and reports, explain

1. In the process of inspection, the inspection decision, the head of the inspection team, another member of the inspection team is the inspector who has the right to request the inspection subject to provide information, documents and report byText, explanation on issues related to the inspection content.

3. The inspection person is responsible for preserving, exploiting and using information and documents for the right purposes.For the original document, the inspection person is responsible for returning the inspection subject after the end of the inspection.

Request relevant agencies, organizations and individuals to provide information and documents

In the process of inspection, the person who issued an inspection decision, the head of the inspection team, another member of the inspection team is the inspectorate with the right to request the relevant agencies, organizations and individuals to provide information, documents on inspection content.

Document sealing

Inventory property

The inspection decision maker, the head of the inspection team decided to inventory assets of the inspection subjects related to the inspection content when detecting between books and documents and reality, difference, irrationalityreason or signs, commit acts of appropriating and appropriating property.

For expertise

Suspend violations

In the process of inspection, when detecting violations causing serious damage to the interests of the State, the legitimate rights and interests of agencies, organizations and individuals, the person who makes an inspection decision, Head of the inspection team decided to suspend violations or propose the competent person to issue a decision to suspend the violation.

Temporarily detaining property, license, practice certificate

1. In the process of inspection, when detecting illegal use of assets, licenses, practicing certificates, it is necessary to immediately prevent or to verify the details of evidence for conclusions and processingThe Head of the Inspection Delegation asked the inspection decision makers or the competent person to decide on the temporary detention of property, licenses and practicing certificates.

2. The custody decision must be written in writing, which clearly states the property, license, practice certificate of custody, the time of custody, the responsibility of the person who issues the custody decision, the obligations of the subjectProperty, licenses, practicing certificates are temporarily seized.The custody must be recorded.

3. The preservation and maintenance of property, licenses and practicing certificates shall comply with the Government's regulations.

Request credit institution blockade accounts of the inspection subject

1. When there are grounds to think that the subject of the inspection disperses the property, does not make the decision to temporarily seize the property, the decision to recover the property of the competent person specified in Articles 89 and Article 91 of this Law,The inspection decision makers requested the credit institution where the inspection subject had an account blockade account to serve the inspection.

4. Credit institutions where an account of the inspection subject shall promptly and fully implement and report in writing on the implementation of the account blockade request.

The recovery of property is appropriated, occupied, used in illegal or lost caused by illegal acts

1. The inspection decision maker issued a decision to recover the property when the inspection subjects committed acts of appropriation, occupation, illegal use or loss of property of the State without having to wait for the conclusion of the bar.investigate, except for other laws.

The decision to recover assets must be written in writing, which clearly states that the property must be recovered, the responsibilities of the relevant agencies, organizations and individuals, the implementation time, the responsibility of the subject with talent.Products are recovered.Subjects whose property must be strictly complied with the recovery decision.

The decision makers are responsible for monitoring, checking and urging the implementation of that recovery decision.

3. The Government details this.

Obligations of the inspection subject

1. Comply with inspection decisions.

2. Provide timely, complete and accurate information and documents at the request of the inspection person and take responsibility before the law for the accuracy and truthfulness of the information and documents provided.

3. To fulfill the requirements, petitions, inspection conclusions and handling decisions on inspections and competent agencies and individuals.

Relevant agencies, organizations and individuals have the right to complain about the administrative decisions, administrative acts of the inspection and decision on handling of inspections in accordance with the law on complaints when there is alignment.think that decisions or behaviors are illegal, infringing upon their legitimate rights and interests;Recommendations on the content of the inspection conclusion when it is that the content is not accurate.

Trách nhiệm của người ra quyết định thanh tra và Thủ trưởng cơ quan, đơn vị quản lý trực tiếp người là thành viên Đoàn thanh tra

1. Người ra quyết định thanh tra có trách nhiệm giám sát hoạt động của Đoàn thanh tra.

Trong trường hợp cần thiết, người ra quyết định thanh tra ra quyết định giao công chức hoặc thành lập Tổ giám sát thực hiện giám sát hoạt động của Đoàn thanh tra (sau đây gọi chung là người thực hiện giám sát), trong đó xác định rõ nội dung, thành phần, thời gian và phương thức giám sát. Quyết định giám sát được ban hành cùng thời điểm ban hành quyết định thanh tra hoặc trong quá trình tiến hành thanh tra khi có thông tin, phản ánh, kiến nghị, tố cáo về hoạt động của Đoàn thanh tra.

2. Thủ trưởng cơ quan, đơn vị quản lý trực tiếp người là thành viên Đoàn thanh tra có trách nhiệm giám sát người đó trong quá trình thực hiện nhiệm vụ thanh tra.

Nội dung giám sát hoạt động của Đoàn thanh tra

1. Việc chấp hành các quy định của pháp luật về căn cứ, thẩm quyền và trình tự, thủ tục thực hiện các nhiệm vụ, quyền hạn trong hoạt động thanh tra của Trưởng đoàn thanh tra, thành viên khác của Đoàn thanh tra.

2. Việc chấp hành chỉ đạo của người ra quyết định thanh tra; việc thực hiện quyết định thanh tra, kế hoạch tiến hành thanh tra; việc chấp hành chế độ thông tin, báo cáo.

3. Việc chấp hành quy định của pháp luật về các hành vi bị nghiêm cấm của Trưởng đoàn thanh tra, thành viên khác của Đoàn thanh tra; việc tiếp nhận khiếu nại, tố cáo, kiến nghị, phản ánh trong hoạt động của Đoàn thanh tra.

The Prime Minister, Minister, General Director, Director, Chairman of the provincial People's Committee, Director of the Department, Chairman of the district People's Committee assigns agencies and units in charge of organization, officials in charge and coordinating with competent agencies to manage cadres, civil servants and public employees to handle cadres, civil servants and public employees who violate the law stated in the inspection conclusions;assigned the Government Inspectorate, Ministry Inspectorate, Provincial Inspectorate, District Inspectorate to monitor and urge the implementation.

Based on the provisions of this Law and other provisions of the relevant law, within the scope of their duties and powers, other agencies of the State, public non -business units, establishing a bar organization.internal investigation or arrangement of officials in charge of internal inspection in accordance with the Government's regulations to help heads of agencies and units carry out inspection work within their management scope.Heads of agencies and units are responsible for organizing and directing internal inspection activities in their agencies and units.

Amend and supplement a number of articles of the laws related to inspection

1. Amending and supplementing a number of clauses of Article 46 of the Law on Handling of Administrative violations No. 15/2012/QH13 has been amended and supplemented a number of articles under the Law No. 54/2014/QH13, Law No. 18/2017/QH14 and Law No. 67/2020/QH14 as follows:

a) Additional phrase "Chief Inspector of the General Department, other departments of the Ministry and the equivalent;"After the phrase "Chief Inspector of the State Securities Commission;"At the opening paragraph of Clause 2;

b) Additional phrase "Chief Inspector of the Government Agency, Chief Inspector of the province," in front of the phrase "Director of Statistical Department," at the opening paragraph of Clause 3.

2. Amending and supplementing Point a, Clause 2, Article 160 of the Law on Environmental Protection No. 72/2020/QH14 as follows:

"A) Inspection as planned;".

Effective

1. This law takes effect from July 1, 2023.

2. The Law on Inspection No. 56/2010/QH12 expires from the effective date of this Law.

Transition regulations

Inspections that have an inspection decision shall be issued before the effective date of this Law, continue to comply with the Law on Inspection No. 56/2010/QH12.

This law was approved by the National Assembly of the Socialist Republic of Vietnam, the 4th session on November 14, 2022.



National Assembly Chairman Vuong Dinh Hue

relevant_article.law_id: Law on Domestic Violence Prevention and Control 2022
relevant_article.article_text:
Scope

This Law stipulates the prevention, prevention, protection, support and handling of violations in the prevention and control of domestic violence;conditions to ensure domestic violence prevention and control;State management and responsibilities of agencies, organizations, families and individuals in the prevention and control of domestic violence.

relevant_article.law_id: Law on Domestic Violence Prevention and Control 2022
relevant_article.article_text:
Explain words

In this law, the words below are understood as follows:

1. Domestic violence is an intentional act of family members causing harm or being able to cause physical, mental, sexual and economic harm to other family members.

2. Prohibiting contacts is a measure to prohibit domestic violence acts near people with domestic violence or use of vehicles and tools to commit domestic violence acts.

3. The temporary place of shelter is a place to ensure safety for people with domestic violence.

4. Education, support for conversion of domestic violence is the process of providing knowledge, behavior skills, controlling negative emotions, controlling behavior, resolving conflicts to help people with violent actsFamily force ending domestic violence.

relevant_article.law_id: Law on Domestic Violence Prevention and Control 2022
Law on Domestic Violence Prevention and Control 2022
relevant_article.article_text:
Principle of prevention and control of domestic violence

1. Prevention is the main, taking people with domestic violence is the center.

2. Respect and protect the legitimate rights and interests of the relevant people;ensure the best benefits of children;Priority to protect the legitimate rights and interests of domestic violence people who are pregnant women, women who are raising children under 36 months of age, elderly, disabled people, people who are unable to take care of themselves;Implement gender equality.

3. Focusing on propaganda, education, consultancy and conciliation in domestic violence prevention and control.

4. Acts of violating the law on prevention and control of domestic violence must be promptly detected, prevented and strictly handled in accordance with the law.In case a person with domestic violence is children, in the process of handling, there must be the participation of representatives of the state management agency on children or the assigned person to protect children.

5. Improving responsibilities of agencies, organizations and heads;focus on coordinating interdisciplinary in the prevention and control of domestic violence.

6. Promoting the role and responsibility of individuals, families and communities.

7. Performing the responsibility to set an example in the prevention and control of domestic violence against cadres, civil servants, officials and people of the people's armed forces.

relevant_article.law_id: Law on Domestic Violence Prevention and Control 2022
relevant_article.article_text:
Acts are strictly prohibited in domestic violence prevention and control

1. Domestic violence acts specified in Article 3 of this Law.

2. Inciting, inciting, enticing, seducing, helping and forcing others to commit domestic violence.

3. Using and spreading information, documents, images and sounds to incite domestic violence.

4. Revenge and threaten revenge on people who help domestic violence, who discover, report, denounce and prevent domestic violence.

5. Hearing the detection, reporting, denunciation, preventing and handling domestic violence.

6. Taking advantage of domestic violence prevention and control activities to commit illegal acts.

7. Tolerance, covering, not handling and handling improperly the provisions of law for domestic violence.

relevant_article.law_id: Law on Domestic Violence Prevention and Control 2022
relevant_article.article_text:
State policies on domestic violence prevention and control

1. The State arranges budget to effectively implement domestic violence prevention and control;Priority is given to ethnic minority and mountainous areas and areas with extremely difficult socio -economic conditions.

2. To encourage agencies, organizations and individuals to support, sponsor, donate, contribute, support, support, invest in funding, human resources, facilities and necessities for the office work, anti -domestic violence;International cooperation on domestic violence prevention and control;developing happy family construction consultancy models, preventing domestic violence and supporting domestic violence;Develop a network of population collaborators participating in family work, prevention and control of domestic violence in the community.

3. Encouraging literary and artistic writing on domestic violence prevention and control;Application of science and information technology in domestic violence prevention and control.

4. Praise and reward agencies, organizations and individuals with achievements in domestic violence prevention and control;There is a support regime to compensate for health damage, life and property damage to individuals participating in domestic violence prevention and control.

5. Supporting the fostering of improving capacity for people working in the prevention and control of domestic violence.

relevant_article.law_id: Law on Domestic Violence Prevention and Control 2022
relevant_article.article_text:
Month of National Action Prevention and Control

1. The month of National Action Prevention and Control of domestic violence was held in June every year to promote domestic violence prevention and control activities and honor family values.

2. The Ministry of Culture, Sports and Tourism shall assume the prime responsibility for, and coordinate with relevant agencies and organizations to direct, guide and organize the implementation of the National Action Month of Domestic Violence Prevention and Control.

relevant_article.law_id: Law on Domestic Violence Prevention and Control 2022
Law on Domestic Violence Prevention and Control 2022
Law on Domestic Violence Prevention and Control 2022
Law on Domestic Violence Prevention and Control 2022
relevant_article.article_text:
Trách nhiệm của thành viên gia đình trong phòng, chống bạo lực gia đình

1. Giáo dục, nhắc nhở thành viên gia đình thực hiện quy định của pháp luật về phòng, chống bạo lực gia đình, hôn nhân và gia đình, bình đẳng giới và quy định khác của pháp luật có liên quan.

2. Hòa giải mâu thuẫn, tranh chấp giữa các thành viên gia đình; yêu cầu người có hành vi bạo lực gia đình chấm dứt ngay hành vi bạo lực gia đình; tham gia chăm sóc người bị bạo lực gia đình.

3. Phối hợp với cơ quan, tổ chức, cá nhân và cộng đồng dân cư trong phòng, chống bạo lực gia đình.

4. Thực hiện các biện pháp trong phòng, chống bạo lực gia đình theo quy định của Luật này và quy định khác của pháp luật có liên quan.

relevant_article.law_id: Law on Domestic Violence Prevention and Control 2022
relevant_article.article_text:
Rights and responsibilities of individuals in prevention and control of domestic violence

1. To be rewarded for achievements in prevention and control of domestic violence in accordance with the law on emulation and commendation;To be protected and kept confidential about personal information when reporting and denouncing domestic violence;supported by the State to compensate for health damage, life and property damage when participating in domestic violence prevention and control according to the Government's regulations.

2. Individuals when detecting the following responsible domestic violence acts:

a) To report and denounce immediately to competent agencies, organizations and individuals prescribed in Clause 1, Article 19 of this Law;

b) Participate in protecting and supporting domestic violence and domestic violence prevention and control activities in the community.

relevant_article.law_id: Law on Domestic Violence Prevention and Control 2022
Law on Domestic Violence Prevention and Control 2022
relevant_article.article_text:
Information, communication, education

1. Policies and laws on domestic violence prevention and control.

2. Human rights, civil rights, gender equality in the family.

3. Good traditions of people and Vietnamese families;Good examples, good deeds in building happy families and prevention of domestic violence.

4. Knowledge of marriage and family;behavioral skills in the family;Skills to protect and support people with domestic violence;prevention, prevention and handling of domestic violence.

5. Domestic and international domestic and international violence prevention and control experience.

6. Other contents related to domestic violence prevention and control.

relevant_article.law_id: Law on Domestic Violence Prevention and Control 2022
Law on Domestic Violence Prevention and Control 2022
Law on Domestic Violence Prevention and Control 2022
Law on Domestic Violence Prevention and Control 2022
relevant_article.article_text:
The subject conducts mediation

1. Family members and lineages are responsible for reconciliation of conflicts and disputes in order to prevent domestic violence from arising or recurring.

In case of necessity, it is possible to invite religious dignitaries, village elders, village chiefs, prestigious people in the community, relatives, people in the agency, organization of the subject with conflicts, disputes and peopleTrained or experienced in social work, psychology, experienced people in the prevention and control of domestic violence to participate in reconciliation.

2. Agencies and organizations are responsible for organizing conflicts and disputes between people of that agency or organization and their family members when they have the request of family members;In case of necessity, coordinate with local agencies and organizations to reconcile.

3. The grassroots conciliation team is responsible for reconciliation, disputes and violations of the law on prevention and control of domestic violence according to the provisions of the Law on Mediation at the grassroots level.

4. Commune -level People's Committees shall assume the prime responsibility and coordinate with the Vietnam Fatherland Front Committee of the same level and other organizations and individuals guiding and fostering knowledge and skills on domestic violence prevention and controlFor the mediator of the grassroots mediation team.

relevant_article.law_id: Law on Domestic Violence Prevention and Control 2022
Luật Phòng, chống bạo lực gia đình 2022
relevant_article.article_text:
Processing news and denunciations about domestic violence behavior

1. Police and border guard agencies near the place where domestic violence occurred when receiving news and denunciations, within the scope of their powers must promptly prevent and handle domestic violence according toauthorization;At the same time, notify the President of the People's Committee of the commune where the acts of domestic violence occurred.

2. Organizations and individuals specified at Points C, D, D and e, Clause 1, Article 19 of this Law when receiving notice and denouncing domestic violence must immediately notify the Chairman of the People's CommitteeThe commune -level people where domestic violence occurs and their ability to participate in preventing domestic violence.

3. The president of the commune -level People's Committee is responsible for processing or assigning it right after receiving the news, denouncing the acts of domestic violence or receiving a report on the group's acts of domestic violence.officials and individuals specified in Clauses 1 and 2 of this Article, except for the case specified in Clause 4 of this Article.

In case of reporting and denouncing the acts of domestic violence that people with violence are children, pregnant women, women who are raising children under 36 months of age, elderly people, people with disabilities, people who do not have the ability toSelf -care or acts of domestic violence have or have the potential to endanger the health and lives of people with violence, the presidents of the commune -level People's Committee assigns the police of communes, wards and townships (The following is collectively called the commune police) handling.

4. In case of reporting and denouncing criminals, the reception and handling of notices and denunciations shall comply with the provisions of the law on criminal proceedings.

5. The process of receiving and handling notice and denunciations on domestic violence acts comply with the Government's regulations.

relevant_article.law_id: Law on Domestic Violence Prevention and Control 2022
relevant_article.article_text:
Use sound and images of domestic violence

1. People with sound and images of domestic violence have the right to supply to competent agencies, organizations and individuals to resolve the case of domestic violence.

2. The use of sound and images of domestic violence in the process of resolving domestic violence and posting on the mass media, the internet must be consent of the violent person.Families or guardians, legal representatives of people with domestic violence, unless otherwise provided for by law.

relevant_article.law_id: Law on Domestic Violence Prevention and Control 2022
Law on Domestic Violence Prevention and Control 2022
relevant_article.article_text:
Forced to end domestic violence

1. Persons competent to settle domestic violence cases may immediately apply necessary measures in accordance with the law to end domestic violence.

2. The person present at the place where domestic violence occurred according to his ability and the nature of domestic violence acts are responsible for asking people who commit domestic violence to immediately stop violent acts.family.

relevant_article.law_id: Law on Domestic Violence Prevention and Control 2022
relevant_article.article_text:
Ask people who commit domestic violence to the commune police headquarters where domestic violence occurred

1. When assigned to resolve the case, the Chief of the Commune Police has the right to request the person who commits domestic violence to go to the commune police headquarters where the domestic violence occurs to clarify information and resolve.The case in the following cases:

a) People with domestic violence are children, pregnant women, women who are raising children under 36 months of age, the elderly, people with disabilities, people who are unable to take care of themselves;

b) When there are grounds to think that domestic violence has or may continue to endanger the health and life of people with domestic violence.

2. The request for people who commit domestic violence to the commune police headquarters must be recorded and have people in the community witnessed.

3. In case a person who has a domestic violence does not comply with the request, the commune police may use the support tool in accordance with the law to bring the person who committed domestic violence to the commune police headquarters..

relevant_article.law_id: Law on Domestic Violence Prevention and Control 2022
relevant_article.article_text:
Prohibited contacts according to the decision of the Chairman of the People's Committee of the commune

1. The president of the People's Committee of the commune where domestic violence occurred decided to apply the ban on contact each time no more than 03 days in the following cases:

a) There is a proposal of a person with domestic violence, guardian or legal representative of a person with domestic violence or agency, organization or individual authority for domestic violence acts.Harm or threaten to harm health or life -threatening of domestic violence.

In case the competent authority, organizations and individuals must have the consent of people with domestic violence or guardians or legal representatives of people with domestic violence;

b) Domestic violence acts that threaten the life of people with domestic violence.

2. Within 12 hours after receiving the request specified at Point a, Clause 1 of this Article, the President of the commune -level People's Committee shall consider and decide on the application of measures to ban contact;In case of not making a decision, a written notice must be notified and clearly stated the reason for agencies, organizations and people who propose to know.

3. The decision to prohibit the contact effect immediately after signing the promulgation and is sent to the person who commits domestic violence, people with domestic violence, the head of the commune police, the head of the village, the head of the residential group where the residential area is located.residence of people with domestic violence.

4. The president of the commune -level People's Committee issued a decision to ban the competent contact with the cancellation of the decision to ban contact.The cancellation of the decision prohibits contact in the following case:

a) There is a request of the person requesting to issue a decision to ban contact specified at Point a, Clause 1 of this Article;

b) People with domestic violence, guardian or legal representative of a domestic violence disagreement with the decision to ban contact specified at Point b, Clause 1 of this Article;

c) When considering this measure is no longer necessary.

5. When applying the decision to ban contact, people with domestic violence, guardian or legal representative of people with domestic violence are entitled to choose accommodation during the time of banning contact.

6. In case a person who commits domestic violence violates the decision to ban contact, the person may apply for temporary detention according to administrative procedures to prevent domestic violence in accordance with the Government's regulations.

7. In case the family has a wedding, a funeral or other special case where people who have domestic violence should contact with people with domestic violence, people who have domestic violence must notify toThe person assigned to monitor the implementation of the exposure ban and commitment not to let domestic violence.

8. The Government details this.

relevant_article.law_id: Law on Domestic Violence Prevention and Control 2022
relevant_article.article_text:
Prohibited contact according to the Court's decision

1. The People's Court is accepting or resolving a civil case between people with domestic violence and people who commit domestic violence to decide to apply contacts for no more than 04 months when there isEnough the following conditions:

a) Domestic violence acts that harm or threaten to harm the health or life threats of people with domestic violence;

b) There is a request of a person with domestic violence or guardian, legal representative of a person with domestic violence or competent authorities, organizations and individuals.

In case the competent authority, organizations and individuals must be required, they must be consent of people with domestic violence or guardians or legal representatives of people with domestic violence.

2. The People's Court is accepting or resolving a civil case between people with domestic violence and people who commit domestic violence themselves to issue a decision to ban contact within a period of no more than 04 months when needed to be told.The life of people with domestic violence.

3. The decision to prohibit the contact effect immediately after signing the promulgation and sent to the person who commits domestic violence, people with domestic violence, presidentsThe head of the village, the head of the residential group of the residence of the person with domestic violence and the People's Procuracy of the same level.

4. The Court issues a decision to ban contact specified in Clause 1 of this Article to cancel the decision to ban contact when the request of the person with domestic violence or the guardian, the legal representative of the personDomestic violence or competent authority, organizations, organizations

5. The Court issues a decision to ban contact specified in Clause 2 of this Article, cancel the decision to ban contact when it is found that this measure is no longer necessary.

6. If the family has a wedding, a funeral or other special cases where people who have domestic violence should contact with domestic violence, people who have domestic violence must notifyThe person assigned to monitor the implementation of the exposure ban and commitment not to let domestic violence.

7. Competence, order and procedures for application, change and cancellation measures for the exposure of this Article shall comply with the provisions of the law on civil proceedings.

relevant_article.law_id: Law on Domestic Violence Prevention and Control 2022
relevant_article.article_text:
Supervise the implementation of the decision to ban contact

1. When receiving the decision to ban contact specified in Article 25 and Article 26 of this Law, the commune police shall assume the prime responsibility for, and coordinate with the head of the village, the head of the residential group and the relevant organization at the grassroots level for the director.Close to the implementation of the decision to ban contact and assign the supervisor of the implementation of the decision to ban contact.

2. The person assigned to supervise is responsible for monitoring the implementation of the decision to ban contact.When detecting people who commit domestic violence violating the decision to prohibit contact, the person assigned to supervise may require the person who committed domestic violence to strictly implement the decision to ban contact;In case of continuing violation, notify the Chief of the Commune Police for handling in accordance with the law.

3. In case the person who has acts of domestic violence is exposed to people with domestic violence specified in Clause 7, Article 25 and Clause 6, Article 26 of this Law, the other member of the family is responsible for supervision forensure no domestic violence.

relevant_article.law_id: Law on Domestic Violence Prevention and Control 2022
relevant_article.article_text:
Arrange temporary shelter and support essential needs

1. Persons with domestic violence are arranged temporarily shunned by the President of the People's Committee of the commune or by the agency, organizations and individuals voluntarily.

2. People with domestic violence are supported with essential needs in accordance with the law on social assistance.

relevant_article.law_id: Law on Domestic Violence Prevention and Control 2022
relevant_article.article_text:
Care and treatment of people with domestic violence

1. The following responsible medical examination and treatment facility:

a) Receive, screen, classify, care for and treat patients who are people with domestic violence;

b) Provide information on the health damage of people with domestic violence at the request of that person or the competent agency, organization or individual.

2. Health staff in the process of caring and treating patients, if the patient is found to show signs of domestic violence, shall immediately report to the head of the medical examination and treatment facility.

3. Domestic violence prevention and control facilities prescribed at Points a, c, dd and e, Clause 2, Article 35 of this Law, based on the functions and tasks responsible for caring for people with domestic violence..

4. The head of the supporting facility for prevention and control of domestic violence is responsible for notifying the commune police where the facility is located in case the person who is cared for and treated shows signs of domestic violence to protect, handling in accordance with the law.

relevant_article.law_id: Luật Phòng, chống bạo lực gia đình 2022
relevant_article.article_text:
Legal assistance and psychological advice, skills to cope with domestic violence

1. People with domestic violence are provided by the State Legal Assistance Center or organize the legal assistance to provide legal assistance services in accordance with the law on legal aid.

2. People with domestic violence are provided with psychological and skills consulting services to respond to domestic violence according to the Government's regulations.

3. The State encourages organizations and individuals to provide free consulting services for people with domestic violence.

relevant_article.law_id: Law on Domestic Violence Prevention and Control 2022
Law on Domestic Violence Prevention and Control 2022
Law on Domestic Violence Prevention and Control 2022
relevant_article.article_text:
Perform the work of serving the community

1. Community service is a small -scale job directly serving the interests of the community where people have domestic violence, including:

a) Participate in planting and tending trees in public areas;repairing and cleaning villages, alleys, streets, alleys, cultural houses, community houses or other public works;

b) Participate in other jobs to improve the living environment and landscape of the community.

2. The list of work prescribed in Clause 1 of this Article is recognized by the President of the commune -level People's Committee on the basis of discussion and decision of the community in accordance with the law on the implementation of democracy in the opportunity.Department.

3. The presidents of the People's Committee of the commune where people commit domestic violence to decide and organize the person who committed domestic violence to perform the work of serving the community.

relevant_article.law_id: Law on Domestic Violence Prevention and Control 2022
relevant_article.article_text:
Protect participants in the prevention and control of domestic violence and people informing and denouncing domestic violence

1. The President of the commune -level People's Committee is responsible for organizing measures to protect people directly participating in the prevention and control of domestic violence, who reported and denounced domestic violence.

2. Agencies, organizations and individuals receiving notice and denunciations of domestic violence are responsible for protecting the confidentiality of the personal information of the report and denouncing.

relevant_article.law_id: Law on Domestic Violence Prevention and Control 2022
Law on Domestic Violence Prevention and Control 2022
relevant_article.article_text:
Truthful address

1. Reliable addresses are reputable organizations and individuals, their ability and voluntary to help domestic violence.

2. Organizations and individuals specified in Clause 1 of this Article notify the commune -level People's Committee on receiving a reliable address.The commune -level People's Committee made a list and announced a reliable address in the management area;guide and organize training for reliable addresses on domestic violence prevention and control.

3. When receiving people with domestic violence, the reliable address must notify the commune -level People's Committee.

The commune -level People's Committee is responsible for protecting and supporting funds for reliable addresses as prescribed by law.

4. The Vietnam Fatherland Front Committee and member organizations of the Front, social organizations are responsible for propagating and mobilizing organizations and individuals to participate as a reliable address in the community.residential.

relevant_article.law_id: Law on Domestic Violence Prevention and Control 2022
relevant_article.article_text:
Medical examination and treatment facility

1. Medical examination and treatment establishments perform the care and treatment of patients who are people with domestic violence as prescribed in Clause 1, Article 29 of this Law.

2. Public medical examination and treatment establishments, depending on the actual conditions arranging temporary places for patients who are people with domestic violence in the period of not exceeding 01 day at the request of people with domestic violence..

relevant_article.law_id: Law on Domestic Violence Prevention and Control 2022
relevant_article.article_text:
Social assistance facilities, State legal aid centers, organized legal aid

1. Social assistance establishments carry out the care and support other necessary conditions for people with domestic violence during the time when people with domestic violence stay at the establishment as prescribed by law.

2. The State Legal Aid Center and the organization participate in legal aid to provide legal assistance services for people with domestic violence in accordance with the law on legal aid.

relevant_article.law_id: Law on Domestic Violence Prevention and Control 2022
relevant_article.article_text:
Other establishments participate in domestic violence prevention and control

1. The State encourages and creates conditions for individuals and organizations to participate in supporting domestic violence prevention and control.

2. Other establishments participate in supporting domestic violence prevention and control on contents and scope of activities with competent state agencies.

3. The Government details Clause 2 of this Article.

relevant_article.law_id: Law on Domestic Violence Prevention and Control 2022
Law on Domestic Violence Prevention and Control 2022
relevant_article.article_text:
Handling violations of the law on prevention and control of domestic violence

1. Organizations and individuals that violate the law on domestic violence prevention and control, depending on the nature and seriousness of violations, are disciplined, sanctioned administrative violations or being examined.Criminal responsibility, if causing damage, compensation must be compensated according to the provisions of law.

2. In case the person who is sanctioned for administrative violations on violations of the law on prevention and control of domestic violence is cadres, civil servants, officials and people of the people's armed forces, the decision makerThe sanctioning is responsible for notifying the heads of agencies, organizations and units competent to manage that person.

relevant_article.law_id: Law on Domestic Violence Prevention and Control 2022
relevant_article.article_text:
Funds for domestic violence prevention and control

1. Finance for domestic violence prevention and control includes:

a) State budget;

b) Source of aid, donation, donation, contribution, support and support of domestic and foreign organizations and individuals in accordance with the law;

c) Other legal financial resources.

2. The state budget for domestic violence prevention and control is arranged in the annual budget estimate of the socio -political organization and organization assigned to the prevention and control of domestic violence..

3. The Government details Clause 2 of this Article and the content of spending and expenditure of domestic violence prevention and control activities guaranteed annually by the State budget.

relevant_article.law_id: Law on Domestic Violence Prevention and Control 2022
Law on Domestic Violence Prevention and Control 2022
relevant_article.article_text:
Interdisciplinary coordination on domestic violence prevention and control

1. The head of the agency or organization is responsible for coordinating with the head of the state management agency on the prevention and control of domestic violence at the same level to implement and evaluate the results of the implementation of the tasks of prevention and control.Domestic violence.

2. Interdisciplinary coordination on domestic violence prevention and control is carried out on the basis of functions, tasks and powers of agencies and organizations, ensuring initiative and efficiency;Promote the responsibility of heads of agencies and organizations to participate in interdisciplinary coordination.

3. Interdisciplinary coordination activities on domestic and local domestic and local violence prevention and control are implemented in accordance with the Regulation on interdisciplinary coordination and the operation regulations of the Family Steering Committee at all levels by the Prime Minister.Government regulations.

relevant_article.law_id: Law on Domestic Violence Prevention and Control 2022
relevant_article.article_text:
Fostering knowledge and skills to participate in domestic violence prevention and control

1. Participants in the prevention and control of domestic violence are fostered with knowledge and skills on domestic violence prevention and knowledge and other necessary knowledge and skills related to domestic violence prevention and control.

2. Judges, jurors, Court Secretary, Procurators, Investigators, Commune Police, Village Heads, Residential Team Heads, Head of Front Task Force in Residential Area, Head of AssociationThe Union and the Steering Committee of the family work are fostered with knowledge, skills to prevent and combat domestic violence, gender equality in the prevention and control of domestic violence.

relevant_article.law_id: Law on Domestic Violence Prevention and Control 2022
relevant_article.article_text:
Content of state management on domestic violence prevention and control

1. Promulgating and submitting to competent authorities for promulgation and organizing the implementation of policies, laws and plans on domestic violence prevention and control.

2. Information, propagation, dissemination and education of law on domestic violence prevention and control.

3. Perform statistics on domestic violence prevention and control.

4. Training and fostering people working in the prevention and control of domestic violence.

5. Scientific research and international cooperation on domestic violence prevention and control.

6. Rewarding individuals and collectives with outstanding achievements in prevention and control of domestic violence.

7. Inspection, examination and settlement of complaints, denunciations and handling violations of domestic violence prevention and control.

relevant_article.law_id: Luật Phòng, chống bạo lực gia đình 2022
relevant_article.article_text:
Trách nhiệm của các cơ quan quản lý nhà nước về phòng, chống bạo lực gia đình

1. Chính phủ thống nhất quản lý nhà nước về phòng, chống bạo lực gia đình; định kỳ 02 năm một lần hoặc đột xuất báo cáo Quốc hội về công tác phòng, chống bạo lực gia đình.

2. Bộ Văn hóa, Thể thao và Du lịch chịu trách nhiệm trước Chính phủ thực hiện quản lý nhà nước về phòng, chống bạo lực gia đình và điều phối liên ngành về phòng, chống bạo lực gia đình.

3. Bộ, cơ quan ngang Bộ, trong phạm vi nhiệm vụ, quyền hạn của mình, có trách nhiệm thực hiện quản lý nhà nước về phòng, chống bạo lực gia đình; thực hiện công tác thống kê về phòng, chống bạo lực gia đình thuộc trách nhiệm quản lý của mình và gửi kết quả đến Bộ Văn hóa, Thể thao và Du lịch.

4. Ủy ban nhân dân các cấp, trong phạm vi nhiệm vụ, quyền hạn của mình, có trách nhiệm thực hiện quản lý nhà nước về phòng, chống bạo lực gia đình tại địa phương. Ủy ban nhân dân cấp tỉnh thực hiện công tác thống kê về phòng, chống bạo lực gia đình thuộc trách nhiệm quản lý của mình và gửi kết quả đến Bộ Văn hóa, Thể thao và Du lịch.

relevant_article.law_id: Law on Domestic Violence Prevention and Control 2022
relevant_article.article_text:
Responsibility of the Ministry of Culture, Sports and Tourism

1. Promulgating according to its competence or submitting to competent state agencies to promulgate legal documents, programs and plans on domestic violence prevention and control.

2. To assume the prime responsibility for, and coordinate with relevant agencies and organizations, organize the implementation of legal documents, programs and plans on domestic violence prevention and control;Interdisciplinary coordination on domestic violence prevention and control.

3. To assume the prime responsibility for, and coordinate with relevant agencies and organizations guiding consulting, information, education and communication;Compilation of sample documents to propagate and disseminate knowledge and skills on domestic violence prevention and control.

4. To assume the prime responsibility for, and coordinate with relevant agencies and organizations, organize the training of knowledge and skills for domestic violence prevention and control.

5. To assume the prime responsibility for, and coordinate with the statistical work and database management on domestic violence prevention and control.

6. To assume the prime responsibility for, and coordinate with relevant agencies in, inspecting, examining and handling violations of the law on prevention and control of domestic violence.

7. Scientific research and international cooperation on domestic violence prevention and control.

8. Direct the construction, implementation, summarizing experiences, replicating the model of domestic violence prevention and control.

9. Guiding the contents of domestic violence prevention and control into the convention and convention of the community.

relevant_article.law_id: Law on Domestic Violence Prevention and Control 2022
Law on Domestic Violence Prevention and Control 2022
relevant_article.article_text:
Responsibilities of local governments at all levels

1. To direct and organize the implementation of the State management contents on domestic violence prevention and control according to local authorities.

2. Arranging funds and human resources to meet the requirements of performing domestic violence prevention and control tasks in the localities in accordance with this Law.

3. Every year, the People's Committees at all levels shall report to the People's Councils of the same level on the prevention and control of domestic violence in the locality.

relevant_article.law_id: Law on Domestic Violence Prevention and Control 2022
relevant_article.article_text:
Responsibilities of the People's Court, the People's Procuracy at all levels

1. Protect the legitimate rights and interests of people with domestic violence.

2. Proactively prevent and promptly detect, prevent and handle violations of the law on domestic violence prevention and control.

3. Carry out fostering knowledge and skills on domestic violence prevention and control for judges, jurors, court secretaries and procurators.

4. Within the scope of their duties and powers, presiding over and coordinating with relevant agencies and organizations to propagate and educate policies and laws on domestic violence prevention and control.

5. Perform statistical work on prevention and control of domestic violence under its responsibility and send results to the Ministry of Culture, Sports and Tourism.

relevant_article.law_id: Law on Domestic Violence Prevention and Control 2022
relevant_article.article_text:
Responsibilities of the Vietnam Fatherland Front and member organizations

1. Social criticism and criticism;participate in social supervision and criticism in formulating and implementing policies and laws on domestic violence prevention and control.

2. Propagating, educating, encouraging and encouraging members, members and the masses to abide by the law on domestic violence prevention and control and other relevant laws.Carry out propaganda and educate skills to control domestic violence in agencies, organizations and people.

3. To propose necessary measures to relevant state agencies to implement the law on domestic violence prevention and control and other relevant laws;participate in prevention and control of domestic violence, care, support and protect people with domestic violence.

4. To assume the prime responsibility for, and coordinate in prevention and control of domestic violence according to the provisions of this Law.

relevant_article.law_id: Law on Domestic Violence Prevention and Control 2022
relevant_article.article_text:
Responsibility of the Vietnam Women's Union

1. To fulfill the responsibilities specified in Article 52 of this Law.

2. Consulting and participating in conciliation on the prevention and control of domestic violence at the grassroots level;Organize the implementation, connect and introduce consulting services, support people with domestic violence.

3. Organize activities to support livelihoods, create jobs or other support for people with domestic violence.

4. To assume the prime responsibility for, and coordinate with the organization of domestic violence prevention and control facilities under the management scope;replicate the model of domestic violence prevention and control.

5. Coordinate with relevant agencies, organizations and individuals to protect and support domestic violent people who are women and children.

6. To coordinate the synthesis, statistical reports on women and children with domestic violence and send results to the Ministry of Culture, Sports and Tourism.

relevant_article.law_id: Law on Domestic Violence Prevention and Control 2022
relevant_article.article_text:
Responsibilities of social organizations, professional social organizations, economic organizations

1. Participate in monitoring the implementation of this Law.

2. Mobilizing and supporting resources to carry out the prevention and control of domestic violence.

3. Participate in propaganda, mobilizing members, members and masses to commit to not committing domestic violence, building happy families.

4. Participate in consulting and reconciliation in prevention and control of domestic violence, supporting people with domestic violence, educating people who commit domestic violence.

5. Receiving and collecting information from members, members, the masses and society to reflect, recommendations and advise agencies, organizations and individuals on the implementation of policies and lawson domestic violence prevention and control.

relevant_article.law_id: Law on Domestic Violence Prevention and Control 2022
relevant_article.article_text:
Amend and supplement Article 135 of the Civil Procedure Code

Amending and supplementing Article 135 of the Civil Procedure Code No. 92/2015/QH13 has been amended and supplemented a number of articles under the Code No. 45/2019/QH14 and Law No. 59/2020/QH14 as follows:

“Article 135. The Court makes a decision to apply temporary emergency measures on its own

The Court made a decision to apply temporary emergency measures specified in Clauses 1, 2, 3, 4, 5 and 14, Article 114 of this Code in case the involved parties do not require urgent measures to apply.temporary level. ”.

relevant_article.law_id: Luật Phòng, chống bạo lực gia đình 2022
relevant_article.article_text:
Effective

1. This law takes effect from July 1, 2023.

2. The Law on Domestic Violence Prevention and Control No. 02/2007/QH12 expires from the effective date of this Law.

Scope

This Law stipulates drug prevention and control;illegally manage narcotic substances;drug detoxification;responsibilities of individuals, families, agencies and organizations in drug prevention and control;State management and international cooperation on drug prevention and control.

relevant_article.law_id: Law on Drug Prevention and Control 2021
relevant_article.article_text:
Explain words

In this law, the words below are understood as follows;

1. Narcotic substances are addictive substances, psychotropic substances prescribed in the list of narcotic substances issued by the Government.

2. Addictive substances are stimulants or neurological inhibitors, easily causing addiction to users.

3. Psychotropic substances are stimulants or neurological inhibitors or hallucinations, if used many times, it can lead to addiction to the user.

4. Pre -substance is an indispensable chemical in the process of preparing and producing narcotic substances specified in the list of precursors issued by the Government.

5. Veterinary drugs contain narcotic substances, precursors are veterinary drugs containing substances specified in Clauses 2, 3 and 4 of this Article.

6. Plants containing drugs are opium, Caoca, marijuana plants and other plants containing narcotic substances prescribed by the government.

7. Prevention and control of drugs is prevention, prevention and fight against crime and drug evils;Control legal activities related to drugs.

8. Drug evils are the illegal use of narcotics, drug addiction and acts of violating drug laws that are not to the extent or not being examined for penal liability.

9. Control of legal activities related to drugs is the permission, monitoring, inspection and supervision of legal activities related to drugs and prevention and preventing the abuse of such activitiesFor other purposes.

10. Illegal drug users who have acts of using narcotic substances without permission of a competent person or professional body and testing of narcotic substances in the body have positive results..

11. Testing of narcotic substances in the body is the implementation of professional techniques to identify narcotic substances in the body through urine samples, blood samples or other specimens of the human body.

12. Drug addicts are people who use drugs, addictive drugs, psychotropic drugs and are dependent on these substances.

13. Drug detoxification is the process of carrying out health, psychological and social support activities, helping drug addicts to stop using drugs, addictive drugs, psychotropic drugs, physical restoration., spirit, raising awareness, changing behaviors to stop the illegal use of these substances.

14. Drug detoxification establishment is the establishment establishment to fully implement the detoxification process in accordance with this Law, including public drug detoxification and voluntary drug detoxification establishments.

relevant_article.law_id: Law on Drug Prevention and Control 2021
relevant_article.article_text:
State policies on drug prevention and control

1. To synchronously implement drug prevention and control measures;Combined with HIV/AIDS prevention and control and other social evils.

2. Strengthening propaganda and education on drug prevention and control;encourage organizations and individuals to participate in propaganda and education for drug prevention and control.

3. Prioritizing drug prevention and control resources for ethnic minority and mountainous areas, remote areas, islands, border areas and complex areas of drugs.

4. Officers and soldiers of the agency in charge of preventing and fighting against drug crimes and people working in drug detoxification in public drug detoxification facilities are entitled to appropriate preferential regimes and policiesWith the nature of the tasks and areas operating in accordance with the Government's regulations.

5. Protection and support for individuals, families, agencies and organizations to participate in drug prevention and control.

6. Strictly manage illegal users of narcotics and drug addicts;encourage drug addicts to voluntarily detoxify drugs, treat addicts of opium forms with alternative drugs;encourage individuals, families, agencies and organizations to participate, support drug detoxification activities, after -drug detoxification.

7. Ensuring compulsory drug detoxification funds;Support for voluntary drug detoxification and management funding after drug detoxification.

8. Organizations and individuals in the country and abroad invest in drug detoxification activities, support for post -detoxification management, drug relapse prevention and control are exempted from land rent, and income tax reduction, income taxEnterprises in accordance with the law.

9. Encouraging scientific research, technological development and high -tech application in drug prevention and control.

10. Rewarding individuals, organizations and agencies with achievements in drug prevention and control.

relevant_article.law_id: Law on Drug Prevention and Control 2021
relevant_article.article_text:
Financial sources for drug prevention and control

1. State budget.

2. Source of funding, aid, investment and donation of domestic and foreign organizations and individuals.

3. Payment of family and drug addicts.

4. Other legal financial resources.

relevant_article.law_id: Law on Drug Prevention and Control 2021
relevant_article.article_text:
The acts are strictly prohibited

1. Planting plants containing narcotic substances, instructions for planting trees containing narcotics.

2. Research, inspection, testing, testing, manufacturing, storing, transporting, preserving, storing, trading, distributing, processing, exchanging, exporting, importing, temporary import, temporary importre -export, temporary export, re -entry, illegal transit of narcotics, precursors, addictive drugs, psychotropic drugs, precursors, ingredients for drugs are addictive pharmacies, psychotropic substances, precursors for useMaking medicine, veterinary medicine contains narcotics and precursors.

3. Obsters of narcotic substances, precursors, addictive drugs, psychotropic drugs, precursor medicine, medicinal ingredients are addictive pharmacies, psychotropic substances, precursors used as medicines, veterinary drugs containing substancesDrugs, precursors.

4. Delivery, management, control, storage, allocation and preservation of narcotics and precursors in contravention of law;Allow users to use narcotics, addictive drugs or psychotropic drugs to the provisions of the law.

5. Use and organize illegal use of narcotics;Forced, enticing other people to illegally use narcotics;Has, support the illegal use of narcotics.

6. Producing, storing, transporting, buying and selling vehicles and tools for illegal production or use of narcotics.

7. against or hinder the testing of narcotics in the body, determine the situation of drug addiction, illegally manage narcotics, drug detoxification, after -drug detoxification.

8. Revenge or hinder the person who performs the task of preventing and combating drugs and participants in drug prevention and control.

9. Taking advantage of positions, powers and occupations to violate the law on drug prevention and control.

10. Instructions for illegal production and instructions for using narcotics;advertising, narcotic marketing.

11. Illegally discriminated for drug users, drug addicts, and after -drug detoxifications.

12. Other prohibited acts due to drug -related laws.

relevant_article.law_id: Law on Drug Prevention and Control 2021
relevant_article.article_text:
Responsibility of individuals and families

1. Propagating and educating members of the family and relatives about the harmful effects of drugs and implementing the provisions of the law on drug prevention and control;manage and prevent family members violating the law on drug prevention and control.

2. To comply with the instructions of the competent person on the use of addictive drugs, psychotropic drugs, precursors, and veterinary drugs containing narcotic and precursors.

3. Cooperating with functional agencies in the struggle with criminals and drug evils;Participate in supporting voluntary drug detoxification activities at home, community, drug detoxification at drug detoxification and treatment of opium forms with alternative drugs;monitor and help the post -detoxification person to integrate into the community;Prevention and control of drug relapse.

4. Provide timely information on criminals, drug evils and planting trees containing narcotics to the police or competent state agencies;Participate in removing trees containing narcotics organized by local authorities.

Responsibilities of state agencies

1. Organizing drug prevention and control in agencies and units;prevention and prevention of cadres, civil servants, officials and employees under the management and officers and soldiers of the people's armed forces violating the law on drug prevention and control;Propagating and mobilizing people to detect, denounce and fight against crimes and drug evils.

2. To organize the implementation of the State's guidelines and policies on socio -economic development and development to replace the planting of trees containing narcotics in areas of removal of narcotic containers.

Trách nhiệm của cơ sở giáo dục

1. Tổ chức thực hiện chương trình giáo dục về phòng, chống ma túy; phổ biến, giáo dục pháp luật về phòng, chống ma túy cho học sinh, sinh viên, học viên; quản lý chặt chẽ, ngăn chặn học sinh, sinh viên, học viên vi phạm pháp luật về phòng, chống ma túy.

2. Phối hợp với gia đình, cơ quan, tổ chức và chính quyền địa phương để quản lý, giáo dục học sinh, sinh viên, học viên về phòng, chống ma túy.

3. Phối hợp với cơ quan, tổ chức, cá nhân có thẩm quyền tổ chức xét nghiệm chất ma túy trong cơ thể khi cần thiết để phát hiện học sinh, sinh viên, học viên sử dụng trái phép chất ma túy.

relevant_article.law_id: Law on Drug Prevention and Control 2021
relevant_article.article_text:
Trách nhiệm của cơ quan báo chí

Cơ quan báo chí có trách nhiệm phối hợp với cơ quan, tổ chức có liên quan tuyên truyền chủ trương, chính sách, pháp luật về phòng, chống ma túy.

Responsibilities of the Vietnam Fatherland Front, member organizations of the Front and other organizations

1. Organizing and coordinating with competent agencies to propagate and disseminate knowledge and laws on drug prevention and control among the people;mobilize people to participate in drug prevention and control and implement drug prevention and control movements.

2. Preventing and preventing people of their organizations and all citizens violating the law on drug prevention and control.

3. Coordinating with local authorities at all levels and competent agencies to mobilize drug addicts to take measures to detoxify drugs, treat addicts of opium forms with alternative drugs;participate in sensitization, education, vocational training, finding jobs and helping the post -detoxification person to integrate into the community;Prevention and control of drug relapse.

relevant_article.law_id: Law on Drug Prevention and Control 2021
relevant_article.article_text:
Cơ quan chuyên trách phòng, chống tội phạm về ma túy

1. Cơ quan chuyên trách phòng, chống tội phạm về ma túy bao gồm:

a) Cơ quan chuyên trách phòng, chống tội phạm về ma túy thuộc Công an nhân dân;

b) Cơ quan chuyên trách phòng, chống tội phạm về ma túy thuộc Bộ đội Biên phòng, Cảnh sát biển Việt Nam và Hải quan.

2. Cơ quan chuyên trách phòng, chống tội phạm về ma túy thuộc Công an nhân dân, trong phạm vi nhiệm vụ, quyền hạn của mình, chủ trì, phối hợp với cơ quan, tổ chức có liên quan thực hiện các hoạt động phòng ngừa, ngăn chặn và đấu tranh chống tội phạm về ma túy.

3. Cơ quan chuyên trách phòng, chống tội phạm về ma túy thuộc Bộ đội Biên phòng, Cảnh sát biển Việt Nam, Hải quan, trong phạm vi nhiệm vụ, quyền hạn của mình, chủ trì, phối hợp với cơ quan công an, cơ quan, tổ chức khác có liên quan thực hiện các hoạt động phòng ngừa, ngăn chặn và đấu tranh chống tội phạm về ma túy tại khu vực hoặc địa bàn quản lý, kiểm soát.

4. Trên cùng một địa bàn khi phát hiện hành vi vi phạm pháp luật liên quan đến nhiệm vụ, quyền hạn của nhiều cơ quan thì cơ quan phát hiện trước có trách nhiệm xử lý theo thẩm quyền do pháp luật quy định; trường hợp vụ việc không thuộc thẩm quyền của mình thì chuyển giao hồ sơ, người, tang vật vi phạm pháp luật cho cơ quan có thẩm quyền chủ trì giải quyết.

5. Chính phủ quy định việc phối hợp của các cơ quan chuyên trách phòng, chống tội phạm về ma túy.

relevant_article.law_id: Law on Drug Prevention and Control 2021
Law on Drug Prevention and Control 2021
relevant_article.article_text:
Control research, assessment and production of narcotics and precursors

1. Activities of research, assessment and production of narcotics (excluding planting trees containing narcotics), precursors must be monitored, inspected and supervised by competent state agencies.

2. The Government stipulates that the competent authority is allowed, the order and procedures are allowed, the monitoring, inspection and supervision prescribed in Clause 1 of this Article.

Control the transportation of narcotics and precursors

1. Agencies, organizations and individuals that have been permitted by competent state agencies shall be transported narcotics and precursors;When carrying out the transportation, they must be packed and sealed according to the regulations of the competent authority;take responsibility for the quantity, quality, take measures to protect safety, not to be lost during the transportation process and subject to the monitoring, inspection and supervision of competent state agencies.

2. The Government details this.

relevant_article.law_id: Law on Drug Prevention and Control 2021
relevant_article.article_text:
Control activities related to addictive drugs, psychotropic drugs, precursor drugs, ingredients for drugs are addictive substances, psychotropic substances, precursors used as medicine

Control activities related to addictive drugs, psychotropic drugs, precursor drugs, and ingredients for drugs are addictive pharmacies, psychotropic substances, and first substances as drugs comply with the provisions of the law on pharmacy, except for activities specified at Points b, Clause 1 and Clause 2, Article 17 of this Law.

Kiểm soát hoạt động liên quan đến thuốc thú y có chứa chất ma túy, tiền chất

Việc kiểm soát hoạt động liên quan đến thuốc thú y có chứa chất ma túy, tiền chất thực hiện theo quy định của Chính phủ.

Control import, export, temporary import, re -export, temporary export, re -import, transit drugs, precursors, addictive drugs, psychotropic drugs, precursor medicine, medicinal ingredients are pharmaceuticalsaddictive, psychotropic pharmaceuticals, precursors used as medicine

1. The following activities must be permitted by the competent authority:

a) Import, export, temporary import, re -export, temporary export and re -import of narcotics and precursors;

b) Temporarily import, re -export, temporarily export, re -import addictive drugs, psychotropic drugs, precursors, medicinal ingredients are addictive substances, psychotropic substances, precursors used as medicines.

2. Operating the territory of Vietnam, narcotics, precursors, addictive drugs, psychotropic drugs, precursor medicine, and medicinal ingredients are addictive pharmacies, psychotropic substances, precursors used as drugs to be drugs mustAccording to the journey stated in the transit license.Agencies and organizations carry out the transit must carry out procedures, under the control of the customs offices and competent agencies of Vietnam.

3. The Government details this.

relevant_article.law_id: Law on Drug Prevention and Control 2021
relevant_article.article_text:
Prepare records of legal activities related to drugs

Agencies, organizations and individuals when conducting activities specified in Clause 1, Article 12 of this Law shall make dossiers and reports according to the Government's regulations.

Controlling legal activities related to drugs for national defense and security purposes

Research, inspection, production, transportation, storage, storage, use, import, export, temporary import, export, temporary export, re -import, transit narcotic, precursor, qualityAddictive drugs, psychotropic drugs, precursor drugs, medicinal ingredients are addictive pharmacies, psychotropic substances, precursors used as medicines, veterinary drugs containing narcotic substances, precursors for defense purposes,Security complies with the Government's regulations.

relevant_article.law_id: Law on Drug Prevention and Control 2021
relevant_article.article_text:
Control of addictive drugs, psychotropic drugs, precursor drugs for first aid purposes, emergency in the journey, international tourism, treating diseases for the entry, exit, transit.

1. The carrying of addictive drugs, psychotropic drugs, pre -prophetic drugs for first aid, emergency on ships, aircraft, trains, cars or other means of transport in the journey, travelThe international calendar is not considered to be exported, imported and transited in Vietnam.

The commander, operators of the vehicle are responsible for declaring to the Vietnamese customs office, explaining the number of drugs used, applying appropriate safety measures to prevent the use.illegally or illegally transported those drugs and under the control of the competent authority of Vietnam.

2. The carrying of addictive drugs, psychotropic drugs, pre -quality drugs to treat the disease for themselves, exit or transit Vietnamese territory comply with the Government's regulations and subject to controlcompetent authority of Vietnam.

Treatment of narcotic substances, precursors, addictive drugs, psychotropic drugs, precursor medicine, ingredients for drugs are addictive pharmacies, psychotropic substances, precursors for drugs, veterinary drugs containing narcotic substances, the precursor seized in the case of law violations

Narcotic substances, precursors, addictive drugs, psychotropic drugs, precursors, ingredients for drugs are addictive pharmacies, psychotropic substances, precursors used as medicines, veterinary drugs containing narcotic substances, moneyThe substance seized in criminal cases, cases of administrative violations are handled in accordance with the law on criminal proceedings and the law on handling of administrative violations.

relevant_article.law_id: Law on Drug Prevention and Control 2021
relevant_article.article_text:
The responsibility of illegal narcotics

1. Provide adequate and accurate information about illegal use of their narcotics to the commune police at the residence.

2. Observe the management of the commune -level People's Committee.

relevant_article.law_id: Law on Drug Prevention and Control 2021
relevant_article.article_text:
Lập danh sách người sử dụng trái phép chất ma túy

1. Công an cấp xã giúp Ủy ban nhân dân cùng cấp lập danh sách người sử dụng trái phép chất ma túy cư trú tại địa phương.

2. Khi người sử dụng trái phép chất ma túy thay đổi nơi cư trú thì công an cấp xã nơi chuyển đi có trách nhiệm thông báo cho công an cấp xã nơi chuyển đến trong thời hạn 05 ngày làm việc kể từ ngày người đó chuyển khỏi địa phương để đưa vào danh sách và tiếp tục quản lý.

3. Công an cấp xã giúp Ủy ban nhân dân cùng cấp đưa ra khỏi danh sách người sử dụng trái phép chất ma túy trong các trường hợp sau đây:

a) Người sử dụng trái phép chất ma túy không có hành vi sử dụng trái phép chất ma túy trong thời gian quản lý quy định tại khoản 2 Điều 23 của Luật này;

b) Người sử dụng trái phép chất ma túy thuộc trường hợp dừng quản lý quy định tại khoản 5 Điều 23 của Luật này;

c) Người sử dụng trái phép chất ma túy chuyển đến cư trú ở địa phương khác.

relevant_article.law_id: Law on Drug Prevention and Control 2021
Law on Drug Prevention and Control 2021
relevant_article.article_text:
Các biện pháp cai nghiện ma túy

1. Biện pháp cai nghiện ma túy bao gồm:

a) Cai nghiện ma túy tự nguyện;

b) Cai nghiện ma túy bắt buộc.

2. Biện pháp cai nghiện ma túy tự nguyện được thực hiện tại gia đình, cộng đồng hoặc tại cơ sở cai nghiện ma túy; biện pháp cai nghiện ma túy bắt buộc được thực hiện tại cơ sở cai nghiện ma túy công lập.

relevant_article.law_id: Law on Drug Prevention and Control 2021
Law on Drug Prevention and Control 2021
relevant_article.article_text:
Cai nghiện ma túy tự nguyện tại cơ sở cai nghiện ma túy

1. Thời hạn cai nghiện ma túy tự nguyện tại cơ sở cai nghiện ma túy là từ đủ 06 tháng đến 12 tháng.

2. Người cai nghiện ma túy tự nguyện tại cơ sở cai nghiện ma túy khi hoàn thành ít nhất 03 giai đoạn quy định tại các điểm a, b và c khoản 1 Điều 29 của Luật này được hỗ trợ kinh phí.

3. Người cai nghiện ma túy tự nguyện tại cơ sở cai nghiện ma túy có trách nhiệm sau đây:

a) Thực hiện đúng, đầy đủ các quy định về cai nghiện ma túy tự nguyện và tuân thủ hướng dẫn của cơ quan chuyên môn;

b) Nộp chi phí liên quan đến cai nghiện ma túy theo quy định.

Trường hợp người cai nghiện ma túy tự nguyện tại cơ sở cai nghiện ma túy công lập mà có hoàn cảnh khó khăn được xét giảm hoặc miễn chi phí phải nộp.

4. Cơ sở cai nghiện ma túy có trách nhiệm cấp giấy xác nhận hoàn thành cai nghiện ma túy tự nguyện cho người cai nghiện ma túy.

5. Chính phủ quy định chi tiết Điều này.

relevant_article.law_id: Law on Drug Prevention and Control 2021

relevant_article.article_text:
Cai nghiện ma túy cho người từ đủ 12 tuổi đến dưới 18 tuổi

1. Người nghiện ma túy từ đủ 12 tuổi đến dưới 18 tuổi bị đưa vào cơ sở cai nghiện bắt buộc khi thuộc một trong các trường hợp sau đây:

a) Không đăng ký, không thực hiện hoặc tự ý chấm dứt cai nghiện ma túy tự nguyện;

b) Trong thời gian cai nghiện ma túy tự nguyện bị phát hiện sử dụng trái phép chất ma túy;

c) Người nghiện ma túy các chất dạng thuốc phiện không đăng ký, không thực hiện hoặc tự ý chấm dứt điều trị nghiện các chất dạng thuốc phiện bằng thuốc thay thế hoặc bị chấm dứt điều trị nghiện các chất dạng thuốc phiện bằng thuốc thay thế do vi phạm quy định về điều trị nghiện.

2. Người nghiện ma túy từ đủ 12 tuổi đến dưới 18 tuổi bị đưa vào cơ sở cai nghiện bắt buộc có trách nhiệm sau đây:

a) Tuân thủ các quy định về cai nghiện ma túy bắt buộc, nội quy, quy chế và chịu sự quản lý, giáo dục, điều trị của cơ sở cai nghiện bắt buộc;

b) Tham gia các hoạt động điều trị, chữa bệnh, giáo dục, tư vấn, học văn hóa, học nghề, lao động trị liệu và các hoạt động phục hồi hành vi, nhân cách.

3. Thời hạn cai nghiện ma túy bắt buộc đối với người nghiện ma túy từ đủ 12 tuổi đến dưới 18 tuổi là từ đủ 06 tháng đến 12 tháng.

4. Việc đưa người nghiện ma túy từ đủ 12 tuổi đến dưới 18 tuổi vào cơ sở cai nghiện bắt buộc do Tòa án nhân dân cấp huyện quyết định và không phải là biện pháp xử lý hành chính.

5. Ủy ban Thường vụ Quốc hội quy định trình tự, thủ tục Tòa án nhân dân xem xét, quyết định việc đưa người nghiện ma túy từ đủ 12 tuổi đến dưới 18 tuổi vào cơ sở cai nghiện bắt buộc.

Lập hồ sơ đề nghị đưa vào cơ sở cai nghiện bắt buộc đối với người nghiện ma túy từ đủ 12 tuổi đến dưới 18 tuổi

1. Việc lập hồ sơ đề nghị đưa vào cơ sở cai nghiện bắt buộc đối với người nghiện ma túy từ đủ 12 tuổi đến dưới 18 tuổi được thực hiện như sau:

a) Chủ tịch Ủy ban nhân dân cấp xã nơi người đó cư trú hoặc có hành vi vi phạm trong trường hợp không xác định được nơi cư trú lập hồ sơ đề nghị đưa vào cơ sở cai nghiện bắt buộc;

b) Trường hợp người nghiện ma túy do công an cấp huyện hoặc công an cấp tỉnh phát hiện hoặc trong quá trình điều tra, thụ lý các vụ việc vi phạm pháp luật mà đối tượng là người từ đủ 12 tuổi đến dưới 18 tuổi thuộc diện đưa vào cơ sở cai nghiện bắt buộc thì cơ quan công an đang thụ lý vụ việc tiến hành xác minh, thu thập tài liệu và lập hồ sơ đề nghị đưa vào cơ sở cai nghiện bắt buộc đối với người đó;

c) Hồ sơ đề nghị bao gồm biên bản vi phạm, bản tóm tắt lý lịch, tài liệu chứng minh tình trạng nghiện ma túy hiện tại của người đó, bản tường trình của người nghiện ma túy hoặc của người đại diện hợp pháp của họ, ý kiến của cha, mẹ, người giám hộ hoặc người đại diện hợp pháp;

d) Công an cấp xã có trách nhiệm giúp Chủ tịch Ủy ban nhân dân cùng cấp thu thập các tài liệu và lập hồ sơ đề nghị quy định tại điểm a khoản 1 Điều này.
